[03] 26^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P0.0133^ea^ ^b^cūḷabodhī^eb^ti mahābodhiparibbājakattabhāvaṃ upādāya idha ``cūḷabodhī''ti samaññā āropitā, na pana imasmiṃ eva jātake (jā0 1.10.49 ādayo) attano jeṭṭhabhātikādino mahābodhissa sambhavatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^susīlavā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sīlavā, sampannasīloti attho. ^b^bhavaṃ disvāna bhayato^eb^ti kāmādibhavaṃ bhāyitabbabhāvena passitvā. ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti ettha ca-saddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo, tena ``disvānā''ti padaṃ ākaḍḍhīyati. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ saṃvegavatthūnaṃ paccavekkhaṇena sabbampi kāmādibhedaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsārabhayato upaṭṭhahamānaṃ disvā nibbānaṃ tassa upāyabhūtā samathavipassanā tadupāyabhūtā ca pabbajjāti idaṃ tividhampi nekkhammaṃ anussavādisiddhena ñāṇacakkhunā tappaṭipakkhato disvā tāpasapabbajjūpagamanena anekādīnavākulā gahaṭṭhabhāvā abhinikkhamitvā gatoti.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ^b^dutiyikā^eb^ti porāṇadutiyikā, gihikāle pajāpatibhūtā. ^b^kanakasannibhā^eb^ti kañcanasannibhattacā. ^b^vaṭṭe anapekkhā^eb^ti saṃsāre nirālayā. ^b^nekkhammaṃ abhinikkhamī^eb^ti nekkhammatthāya gehato nikkhami, pabbajīti attho.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ālayanti sattā etenāti ālayo, taṇhā, tadabhāvena ^b^nirālayā^eb^. tato eva ñātīsu taṇhābandhanassa chinnattā ^b^chinnabandhu^eb^. evaṃ gihibandhanābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pabbajitānampi kesañci yaṃ hoti bandhanaṃ ^a^M0.0132^ea^, tassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``anapekkhā kule gaṇe''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kule^eb^ti upaṭṭhākakule. ^b^gaṇe^eb^ti tāpasagaṇe, sesā brahmacārinoti vuccanti. ^b^upāgamu^eb^nti ubhopi mayaṃ upāgamimhā.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0126^ea^ bārāṇasisāmante. ^b^nipakā^eb^ti paññavanto. ^b^nirākule^eb^ti janasañcārarahitattā janehi anākule, ^b^appasadde^eb^ti migapakkhīnaṃ uṭṭhāpanato tesaṃ vassitasaddenāpi virahitattā appasadde. ^b^rājuyyāne vasāmubho^eb^ti ^a^P0.0134^ea^ bārāṇasirañño uyyāne mayaṃ ubho janā tadā vasāma.

[03] tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- atīte imasmiṃ eva bhaddakappe bodhisatto brahmalokato cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ kāsigāme ekassa mahāvibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. tassa nāmaggahaṇasamaye ``bodhikumāro''ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. vayappattakāle panassa takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā paccāgatassa anicchamānakasseva mātāpitaro samajātikaṃ kulakumārikaṃ ānesuṃ. sāpi brahmalokacutāva uttamarūpadharā devaccharāpaṭibhāgā. tesaṃ anicchamānānaṃ eva aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ kariṃsu. ubhinnampi pana nesaṃ kilesamudācāro na bhūtapubbo, sārāgavasena aññamaññaṃ olokanampi nāhosi, kā pana kathā itarasaṃsagge. evaṃ parisuddhasīlā ahesuṃ.

[03] aparabhāge mahāsatto mātāpitūsu kālaṃkatesu tesaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ katvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā ``bhadde, tvaṃ imaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvāhī''ti āha. ``tvaṃ pana ayyaputtā''ti? ``mayhaṃ dhanena kiccaṃ natthi, pabbajissāmī''ti. ``kiṃ pana pabbajjā itthīnampi na vaṭṭatī''ti? ``vaṭṭati, bhadde''ti. ``tena hi mayhampi dhanena kiccaṃ natthi, ahampi pabbajissāmī''ti. te ubhopi sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ pariccajitvā mahādānaṃ datvā nikkhamitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitvā uñchācariyāya phalāphalehi yāpentā pabbajjāsukheneva dasa saṃvaccharāni vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ``rājuyyāne vasāmubho''ti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ athekadivasaṃ ^a^P0.0135^ea^ rājā uyyānakīḷaṃ gato. uyyānassa ekapasse pabbajjāsukhena vītināmentānaṃ tesaṃ samīpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paramapāsādikaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ ^a^M0.0133^ea^ paribbājikaṃ olokento kilesavasena paṭibaddhacitto hutvā bodhisattaṃ ``ayaṃ te paribbājikā kiṃ hotī''ti pucchi. tena ``na ca kiñci hoti, kevalaṃ ekapabbajjāya pabbajitā, api ca kho pana gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosī''ti vutte rājā ``ayaṃ kiretassa na kiñci hoti, api ca kho panassa gihikāle pādaparicārikā ahosi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ antepuraṃ paveseyyaṃ, tenevassa imissā ^a^V0.0127^ea^ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī''ti andhabālo tattha attano paṭibaddhacittaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto aññataraṃ purisaṃ āṇāpesi ``imaṃ paribbājikaṃ rājanivesanaṃ nehī''ti.

[03] so tassa paṭissuṇitvā ``adhammo loke vattatī''tiādīni vatvā paridevamānaṃ eva taṃ ādāya pāyāsi. bodhisatto tassā paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā ekavāraṃ oloketvā puna na olokesi. ``sace panāhaṃ vāressāmi, tesu cittaṃ padosetvā mayhaṃ sīlassa antarāyo bhavissatī''ti sīlapāramiṃyeva āvajjento nisīdi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``uyyānadassanaṃ gantvā, rājā addasa brāhmaṇi''^eb^ntiādi.
[03] tattha ^b^tuyhesā kā kassa bhariyā^eb^ti tuyhaṃ tava esā kā, kiṃ bhariyā, udāhu bhaginī vā samānā kassa aññassa bhariyā.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^na mayhaṃ bhariyā esā^eb^ti kāmañcesā mayhaṃ gihikāle bhariyā ahosi, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na mayhaṃ bhariyā esā, nāpi ahaṃ etissā sāmiko, kevalaṃ pana sahadhammā ekasāsanī, ahampi paribbājako ayampi paribbājikāti samānadhammā paribbājakasāsanena ekasāsanī, sabrahmacārinīti attho.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^tissā sārattagadhito^eb^ti kāmarāgena sāratto hutvā paṭibaddho. ^b^gāhāpetvāna ceṭake^eb^ti ceṭakehi gaṇhāpetvā ceṭake vā attano rājapurise āṇāpetvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ gaṇhāpetvā. ^b^nippīḷayanto balasā^eb^ti taṃ anicchamānaṃ eva ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanādinā nippīḷayanto bādhento, tathāpi agacchantiṃ balasā balakkārena rājapurisehi gaṇhāpetvā attano antepuraṃ pavesesi.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ^b^odapattakiyā^eb^ti udakapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitabhariyā odapattikā nāma, idaṃ vacanaṃ purāṇadutiyikābhāvena upalakkhaṇamattaṃ ^a^P0.0136^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^M0.0134^ea^, sā panassa brāhmaṇavivāhavasena mātāpitūhi sampaṭipāditā, ``odapattakiyā''ti ca bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^sahajā^eb^ti pabbajjājātivasena sahajātā, tenevāha ^b^``ekasāsanī''^eb^ti. ``ekasāsanī''ti ca idaṃ bhummatthe paccattaṃ, ekasāsaniyāti attho. ^b^nayantiyā^eb^ti nīyantiyā. ^b^kopo me upapajjathā^eb^ti ayaṃ te gihikāle bhariyā brāhmaṇī sīlavatī, pabbajitakāle ca sabrahmacārinībhāvato sahajātā bhaginī, sā tuyhaṃ purato balakkārena ākaḍḍhitvā nīyati. ``bodhibrāhmaṇa, kiṃ te purisabhāva''nti ^a^V0.0128^ea^ purisamānena ussāhito cirakālasayito vammikabilato kenaci purisena ghaṭṭito ``susū''ti phaṇaṃ karonto āsiviso viya me cittato kopo sahasā vuṭṭhāsi.

[03] 34-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahakope samuppanne^eb^ti kopuppattiyā saha, tassa uppattisamanantaramevāti attho. ^b^sīlabbatamanussari^eb^nti attano sīlapāramiṃ āvajjesiṃ. ^b^tattheva kopaṃ niggaṇhi^eb^nti tasmiṃ eva āsane yathānisinnova taṃ kopaṃ nivāresiṃ. ^b^nādāsiṃ vaḍḍhitūparī^eb^ti tato ekavāruppattito upari uddhaṃ vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsiṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kope uppannamatte eva ``nanu tvaṃ, bodhiparibbājaka, sabbapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitukāmo, tassa te kimidaṃ sīlamattepi upakkhalanaṃ, tayidaṃ gunnaṃ khuramattodake osīdantassa mahāsamuddassa paratīraṃ gaṇhitukāmatā viya hotī''ti attānaṃ paribhāsitvā paṭisaṅkhānabalena tasmiṃ eva khaṇe kopaṃ niggahetvā puna uppajjanavasenassa vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsinti. tenevāha ^b^``yadi naṃ brāhmaṇi''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] tassattho -- taṃ paribbājikaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ so rājā vā añño vā koci tiṇhāyapi nisitāya sattiyā koṭṭeyya, khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ yadi chindeyya, evaṃ santepi sīlaṃ attano sīlapāramiṃ neva bhindeyyaṃ. kasmā? bodhiyā eva kāraṇā, sabbattha akhaṇḍitasīleneva sakkā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇituṃ, na itarenāti.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M0.0135^ea^ ^b^me sā brāhmaṇī dessā^eb^ti sā brāhmaṇī jātiyā gottena kulappadesena ācārasampattiyā ciraparicayena pabbajjādiguṇasampattiyā cāti sabbappakārena ^a^P0.0137^ea^ na me dessā na appiyā, etissā mama appiyabhāvo koci natthi. ^b^napi me balaṃ na vijjatī^eb^ti mayhampi balaṃ na na vijjati, atthi eva. ahaṃ nāgabalo thāmasampanno, icchamāno sahasā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ ākaḍḍhante purise nippothetvā taṃ gahetvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthoti dasseti. ^b^sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayha^eb^nti tato paribbājikato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena sabbaññutaññāṇameva mayhaṃ piyaṃ. ^b^tasmā sīlānurakkhissa^eb^nti tena kāraṇena sīlameva anurakkhissaṃ.

[03] atha so rājā uyyāne papañcaṃ akatvāva sīghataraṃ gantvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahantena yasena nimantesi. sā yasassa aguṇaṃ pabbajjāya guṇaṃ attano bodhisattassa ca mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya saṃvegena pabbajitabhāvañca kathesi. rājā kenaci pariyāyena ^a^V0.0129^ea^ tassā manaṃ alabhanto cintesi -- ``ayaṃ paribbājikā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā, sopi paribbājako imāya ākaḍḍhitvā nīyamānāya na kiñci vippakāraṃ dassesi, sabbattha nirapekkhacitto, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ evarūpesu guṇavantesu vippakāro, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ paribbājikaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā imaṃ, tañca paribbājakaṃ khamāpeyya''nti? evaṃ pana cintetvā ``paribbājikaṃ uyyānaṃ ānethā''ti purise āṇāpetvā sayaṃ paṭhamataraṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi -- ``bho pabbajita, kiṃ mayā tāya paribbājikāya nīyamānāya kopo te uppajjitthā''ti. mahāsatto āha --
[21] ``uppajji me na muccittha, na me muccittha jīvato.
[22] rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, khippameva nivārayi''nti.. (jā0 1.10.52).
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā ``kiṃ nu kho esa kopameva sandhāya vadati, udāhu aññaṃ kiñci sippādika''nti cintetvā puna pucchi --
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^P0.0138^ea^ te uppajji no mucci, kiṃ te no mucci jīvato.
[22] rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, katamaṃ taṃ nivārayī''ti.. (jā0 1.10.53).

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0136^ea^ ^b^uppajjī^eb^ti ekavāraṃ uppajji, na puna uppajji. ^b^na muccitthā^eb^ti kāyavacīvikāruppādanavasena pana na muccittha, na naṃ bahi pavattituṃ vissajjesinti attho. ^b^rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhī^eb^ti yathā nāma gimhānaṃ pacchime māse uppannaṃ rajaṃ vipulā akālavuṭṭhidhārā ṭhānaso nivāreti, evaṃ taṃ vūpasamento ^b^nivārayiṃ,^eb^ nivāresinti attho.
[03] athassa mahāpuriso nānappakārena kodhe ādīnavaṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``yamhi jāte na passati, ajāte sādhu passati.
[22] so me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro..
[21] ``yena jātena nandanti, amittā dukkhamesino.
[22] so me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro..
[21] ``yasmiñca ^a^V0.0130^ea^ jāyamānamhi, sadatthaṃ nāvabujjhati.
[22] so me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro..
[21] ``yenābhibhūto kusalaṃ jahāti, parakkare vipulañcāpi atthaṃ.
[22] sa bhīmaseno balavā pamaddī, kodho mahārājā na me amuccatha..
[21] ``kaṭṭhasmiṃ manthamānasmiṃ, pāvako nāma jāyati.
[22] tameva kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahati, yasmā so jāyate gini..
[21] ``evaṃ mandassa posassa, bālassa avijānato.
[22] sārambhā jāyate kodho, sapi teneva ḍayhati..
[21] ``aggīva tiṇakaṭṭhasmiṃ, kodho yassa pavaḍḍhati.
[22] nihīyati tassa yaso, kāḷapakkheva candimā..
[21] ``anindho dhūmaketūva, kodho yassūpasammati.
[22] āpūrati tassa yaso, sukkapakkheva candimā''ti.. (jā0 1.10.54-61) --
[25] imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0137^ea^ ^b^na passatī^eb^ti attatthampi na passati, pageva paratthaṃ. ^b^sādhu passatī^eb^ti attatthaṃ paratthaṃ ubhayatthañca ^a^P0.0139^ea^ sammadeva passati. ^b^dummedhagocaro^eb^ti nippaññānaṃ visayabhūto, nippañño vā gocaro āhāro indhanaṃ etassāti dummedhagocaro. ^b^dukkhamesino^eb^ti dukkhaṃ icchantā. ^b^sadattha^eb^nti attano atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ. ^b^parakkare^eb^ti apaneyya vināseyya. ^b^sabhīmaseno^eb^ti so bhīmāya bhayajananiyā mahatiyā kilesasenāya samannāgato. ^b^pamaddī^eb^ti balavabhāvena satte pamaddanasīlo. ^b^na me amuccathā^eb^ti mama santikā mokkhaṃ na labhi, abbhantare eva damito, nibbisevano katoti attho. khīraṃ viya vā muhuttaṃ dadhibhāvena cittena patiṭṭhahitthātipi attho.

[03] ^b^manthamānasmi^eb^nti araṇisahite mathiyamāne. ``mathamānasmi''ntipi pāṭho. ^b^yasmā^eb^ti yato kaṭṭhā ^a^V0.0131^ea^. ^b^ginī^eb^ti aggi. ^b^bālassa avijānato^eb^ti bālassa ajānantassa. ^b^sārambhā jāyate^eb^ti karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇā sārambhā araṇimanthanato viya pāvako kodho jāyate. ^b^sapi tenevā^eb^ti sopi bālo teneva kodhena kaṭṭhaṃ viya agginā ḍayhati. ^b^anindho dhūmaketūvā^eb^ti anindhano aggi viya. ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassa adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatassa puggalassa ^b^sukkapakkhe^eb^ cando viya laddho, ^b^yaso^eb^ aparāparaṃ ^b^āpūratī^eb^ti.

[03] rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā mahāpurisaṃ paribbājikampi rājagehato āgataṃ khamāpetvā ``tumhe pabbajjāsukhaṃ anubhavantā idheva uyyāne vasatha, ahaṃ vo dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmī''ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi. te ubhopi tattheva vasiṃsu. aparabhāge paribbājikā kālamakāsi. bodhisatto himavantaṃ pavisitvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
[03] tadā paribbājikā rāhulamātā ahosi, rājā ānandatthero, bodhiparibbājako lokanātho.

[03] tassa idhāpi yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. tathā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ ^a^P0.0140^ea^ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ gehato nikkhamanaṃ, tathā nikkhamitvā pabbajitassa bahujanasammatassa sato paramappicchatāya kulesu ca gaṇesu ca alaggatā, accantameva lābhasakkārajigucchāya ^a^M0.0138^ea^ pavivekābhirati, atisayavatī ca abhisallekhavutti, tathārūpāya sīlavatiyā kalyāṇadhammāya paribbājikāya ananuññātā attano purato balakkārena parāmasiyamānāya sīlapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vikārānāpatti, katāparādhe ca tasmiṃ rājini upagate hitacittataṃ mettacittataṃ upaṭṭhapetvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi samanusāsananti evamādayo idha mahāpurisassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbā. tenetaṃ vuccati ``evaṃ acchariyā hete...pe0... dhammassa anudhammato''ti.
[06] cūḷabodhicariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V0.0132^ea^ ^b^mahiṃso pavanacārako^eb^ti mahāvanacārī vanamahiṃso ^b^yadā homī^eb^ti yojanā. ^b^pavaḍḍhakāyo^eb^ti vayasampattiyā aṅgapaccaṅgānañca thūlabhāvena abhivaḍḍhakāyo. ^b^balavā^eb^ti mahābalo thāmasampanno. ^b^mahanto^eb^ti vipulasarīro. hatthikalabhappamāṇo kira tadā bodhisattassa kāyo hoti. ^b^bhīmadassano^eb^ti mahāsarīratāya vanamahiṃsajātitāya ca sīlaṃ ajānantānaṃ bhayaṃ jananato bhayānakadassano.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabbhāre^eb^ti olambakasilākucchiyaṃ. ^b^dakāsaye^eb^ti jalāsayasamīpe. ^b^hotettha ṭhāna^eb^nti ettha mahāvane yo ^b^koci^eb^ padeso vanamahiṃsānaṃ tiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. ^b^tahiṃ tahi^eb^nti tattha tattha.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ^b^vicaranto^eb^ti vihāraphāsukaṃ vīmaṃsituṃ vicaranto. ^b^ṭhānaṃ addasa bhaddaka^eb^nti evaṃ vicaranto tasmiṃ mahāraññe bhaddakaṃ mayhaṃ phāsukaṃ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ addakkhiṃ. disvā ca ^b^taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagantvāna, tiṭṭhāmi ca sayāmi ca^eb^ gocaraṃ gahetvā divā taṃ ^a^P0.0141^ea^ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhānasayanehi vītināmemīti dasseti.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ tadā kira bodhisatto himavantappadese mahiṃsayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto thāmasampanno mahāsarīro hatthikalabhappamāṇo pabbatapādapabbhāragiriduggavanaghaṭādīsu ^a^M0.0139^ea^ vicaranto ekaṃ phāsukaṃ mahārukkhamūlaṃ disvā gocaraṃ gahetvā divā tattha vasati. atheko lolamakkaṭo rukkhā otaritvā mahāsattassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā uccārapassāvaṃ katvā siṅgesu gaṇhitvā olambanto naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā dolāyanto kīḷi. bodhisatto khantimettānuddayasampadāya taṃ tassa anācāraṃ na manasākāsi. makkaṭo punappunaṃ tatheva karoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``athettha kapi māgantvā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^kapi māgantvā^eb^ti kapi āgantvā, ma-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^pāpo^eb^ti lāmako. ^b^anariyo^eb^ti anaye iriyanena aye ca na iriyanena anariyo, nihīnācāroti attho. ^b^lahū^eb^ti lolo. ^b^khandhe^eb^ti khandhappadese. ^b^muttetī^eb^ti passāvaṃ karoti. ^b^ohadetī^eb^ti karīsaṃ ossajjati. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ maṃ, tadā mahiṃsabhūtaṃ maṃ.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakimpi^eb^ ^a^V0.0133^ea^ ^b^divasa^eb^nti ekadivasampi dūseti maṃ sabbakālampi. tenāha ``dūseti maṃ sabbakāla''nti. na kevalañca dutiyatatiyacatutthadivasamattaṃ, atha kho sabbakālampi maṃ passāvādīhi dūseti. yadā yadā muttādīni kātukāmo, tadā tadā mayhameva upari karotīti dasseti. ^b^upadduto^eb^ti bādhito, tena siṅgesu olambanādinā muttādiasucimakkhaṇena tassa ca apaharaṇatthaṃ anekavāraṃ siṅgakoṭīhi vālaggena ca anekavāraṃ kaddamapaṃsumissakaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā dhovanena ca nippīḷito homīti attho.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ^b^yakkho^eb^ti tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā. ^b^maṃ idamabravī^eb^ti rukkhakkhandhe ṭhatvā ``mahiṃsarāja, kasmā imassa duṭṭhamakkaṭassa avamānaṃ sahasī''ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento ^b^nāsehetaṃ chavaṃ pāpaṃ^eb^ ^a^P0.0142^ea^^b^, siṅgehi ca khurehi cā^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ maṃ abhāsi.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ vutte tadā yakkhe^eb^ti tadā tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ yakkhe evaṃ vutte sati. ^b^ahaṃ taṃ idamabravi^eb^nti ahaṃ taṃ yakkhaṃ idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ abraviṃ abhāsiṃ. ^b^kuṇapenā^eb^ti kilesāsucipaggharaṇena sucijātikānaṃ sādhūnaṃ paramajigucchanīyatāya atiduggandhavāyanena ca kuṇapasadisatāya kuṇapena. ^b^pāpenā^eb^ti pāṇātipātapāpena. ^b^anariyenā^eb^ti anariyānaṃ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ asādhūnaṃ māgavikanesādādīnaṃ hīnapurisānaṃ dhammattā anariyena, ^b^kiṃ^eb^ kena kāraṇena, ^b^tvaṃ^eb^ devate ^b^maṃ makkhesi,^eb^ ayuttaṃ tayā vuttaṃ maṃ pāpe niyojentiyāti dasseti.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ idāni tasmiṃ pāpadhamme ādīnavaṃ pakāsento ^b^``yadiha''^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho -- bhadde devate, ahaṃ tassa yadi kujjheyyaṃ, tatopi lāmakataro bhaveyyaṃ. yena hi adhammacaraṇena so bālamakkaṭo nihīno nāma jāto, sace panāhaṃ tatopi balavataraṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyaṃ, nanu tena tato pāpataro bhaveyyaṃ, aṭṭhānañcetaṃ yadihaṃ idhalokaparalokaṃ taduttari ca jānitvā ṭhito ekanteneva parahitāya paṭipanno evarūpaṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyanti. kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^sīlañca me pabhijjeyyā^eb^ti ahañceva kho pana evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ kareyyaṃ, mayhaṃ sīlapāramī khaṇḍitā siyā. ^b^viññū ca garaheyyu ma^eb^nti paṇḍitā ca devamanussā maṃ garaheyyuṃ ``passatha, bho, ayaṃ bodhisatto bodhipariyesanaṃ caramāno evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ akāsī''ti.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ^b^hīḷitā jīvitā vāpī^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇe. evaṃ viññūhi hīḷitā garahitā jīvitāpi ^b^parisuddhena^eb^ parisuddhasīlena hutvā ^b^mataṃ^eb^ vā maraṇameva varaṃ uttamaṃ seyyo. ^b^kyāhaṃ jīvitahetupi^eb^ ^a^V0.0134^ea^, ^b^kāhāmi paraheṭhana^eb^nti evaṃ jānanto ca ahaṃ mayhaṃ jīvitanimittampi parasattavihiṃsanaṃ kiṃ kāhāmi kiṃ karissāmi, etassa karaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho.

[03] ayaṃ pana aññepi maṃ viya maññamāno evaṃ ^a^P0.0143^ea^ anācāraṃ karissati, tato yesaṃ caṇḍamahiṃsānaṃ evaṃ karissati, te eva etaṃ vadhissanti, sā etassa aññehi māraṇā mayhaṃ dukkhato ca pāṇātipātato ca mutti bhavissatīti āha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``mamevāyaṃ maññamāno, aññepevaṃ karissati.
[22] teva tassa vadhissanti, sā me mutti bhavissatī''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^mamevāya^eb^nti maṃ viya ayaṃ. ^b^aññepī^eb^ti aññesampi. sesaṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ^b^hīnamajjhimaukkaṭṭhe^eb^ti ^a^M0.0141^ea^ hīne ca majjhime ca ukkaṭṭhe ca nimittabhūte. ^b^sahanto avamānita^eb^nti vibhāgaṃ akatvā tehi pavattitaṃ avamānaṃ paribhavaṃ sahanto khamanto. ^b^evaṃ labhati sappañño^eb^ti evaṃ hīnādīsu vibhāgaṃ akatvā khantimettānuddayaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā tadaparādhaṃ sahanto sīlādipāramiyo brūhetvā ^b^manasā yathāpatthitaṃ^eb^ yathicchitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ labhati paṭivijjhati, tassa taṃ na dūreti.

[03] evaṃ mahāsatto attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento devatāya dhammaṃ desesi. so katipāhaccayena aññattha gato. añño caṇḍamahiṃso nivāsaphāsutāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā aṭṭhāsi. duṭṭhamakkaṭo ``so eva aya''nti saññāya tassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā tatheva anācāraṃ akāsi. atha naṃ so vidhunanto bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā siṅgena hadaye vijjhitvā pādehi madditvā sañcuṇṇesi.
[03] tadā sīlavā mahiṃsarājā lokanātho.

[03] tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. tathā ^b^hatthināga-^eb^ (cariyā0 2.1 ādayo) ^b^bhūridatta-^eb^ (cariyā0 2.11 ādayo) ^b^campeyyanāgarāja-^eb^ (cariyā0 2.20 ādayo) ^b^cariyāsu^eb^ viya idha mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā veditabbā.
[06] mahiṃsarājacariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V0.0135^ea^ ^a^P0.0144^ea^ ^b^sutattakanakasannibho^eb^ti yathā suṭṭhu apagatasabbakāḷako hoti, evaṃ aggimhi pakkhipitvā sutattakanakasannibho. ^b^migarājā ruru nāmā^eb^ti jātisiddhena nāmena ruru nāma migarājā, jātito ruru, migānañca rājāti attho. ^b^paramasīlasamāhito^eb^ti uttamasīlasamāhito, visuddhasīlo ceva samāhitacitto ca, visuddhasīle vā sammā āhitacittoti evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03] tadā bodhisatto rurumigayoniyaṃ nibbatti. tassa sarīracchavi suṭṭhu tāpetvā majjitakañcanapaṭṭavaṇṇo ahosi, hatthapādā lākhārasaparikammakatā viya, naṅguṭṭhaṃ camarīnaṅguṭṭhaṃ viya, siṅgāni rajatadāmavaṇṇāni akkhīni sumajjitamaṇiguḷikā ^a^M0.0142^ea^ viya, mukhaṃ odahitvā ṭhapitarattakambalageṇḍukā viya. so janasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmo parivāraṃ chaḍḍetvā ekakova gaṅgānivattane ramaṇīye sālamissake supupphitapavane vasati. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``ramme padese ramaṇīye, vivitte amanussake.
[22] tattha vāsaṃ upagañchiṃ, gaṅgākūle manorame''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^ramme padese^eb^ti muttātalasadisavālukācuṇṇapaṇḍarehi bhūmibhāgehi siniddhaharitatiṇasañcaritehi vanatthalehi cittattharaṇehi viya nānāvaṇṇavicittehi silātalehi maṇikkhandhanimmalasalilehi jalāsayehi ca samannāgatattā yebhuyyena ca indagopakavaṇṇāya rattāya sukhasamphassāya tiṇajātiyā sañchannattā ramme araññappadese. ^b^rammaṇīye^eb^ti pupphaphalapallavālaṅkatavipulasākhāvinaddhehi nānāvidhadijagaṇūpakūjitehi vividhatarulatāvanavirājitehi yebhuyyena ambasālavanasaṇḍamaṇḍitehi vanagahanehi upasobhitattā tattha paviṭṭhassa janassa ratijananaṭṭhena ramaṇīye. vuttampi cetaṃ ^b^rurumigarājajātake^eb^ --
[21] ``etasmiṃ ^a^P0.0145^ea^ vanasaṇḍasmiṃ, ambā sālā ca pupphitā.
[22] indagopakasañchanno, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo''ti.. (jā0 1.13.119).

[03] ^b^vivitte^eb^ti janavāsavirahena suññe. ^b^amanussake^eb^ti sañcaraṇamanussānampi tattha abhāvena manussarahite ^a^V0.0136^ea^. ^b^manorame^eb^ti yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā visesato pavivekakāmānaṃ mano rametīti manorame.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha uparigaṅgāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^athā^eb^ti adhikāre nipāto, tena mayi tattha tathā vasante idaṃ adhikārantaraṃ uppannanti dīpeti. ^b^uparigaṅgāyā^eb^ti gaṅgāya nadiyā uparisote. ^b^dhanikehi paripīḷito^eb^ti iṇaṃ gahetvā taṃ dātuṃ asakkonto iṇāyikehi codiyamāno.

[03] eko kira bārāṇasiseṭṭhi attano puttaṃ ``ayaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhanto kilamissatī''ti kiñci sippaṃ na uggaṇhāpesi. gītavāditanaccakhādanabhojanato uddhaṃ na kiñci aññāsi. taṃ vayappattaṃ patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā dhanaṃ niyyātetvā mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. so tesaṃ accayena ^a^M0.0143^ea^ itthidhuttasurādhuttādiparivuto nānābyasanamukhehi sabbaṃ dhanaṃ viddhaṃsetvā tattha tattha iṇaṃ ādāya tampi dātuṃ asakkonto dhanikehi codiyamāno ``kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, tenevamhi attabhāvena añño viya jāto, maraṇaṃ me seyyo''ti cintetvā iṇāyike āha -- ``tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇāni gahetvā āgacchatha, gaṅgātīre me nihitaṃ kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ vo dassāmī''ti. te tena saddhiṃ agamaṃsu. so ``idha dhanaṃ, ettha dhana''nti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto viya ``evaṃ me iṇamokkho bhavissatī''ti palāyitvā gaṅgāyaṃ pati. so caṇḍasotena vuyhanto kāruññaravaṃ ravi. tena vuttaṃ ``atha uparigaṅgāyā''tiādi.
[03] tattha ^b^jīvāmi vā marāmi vā^eb^ti imasmiṃ gaṅgāsote patito jīvāmi vā marāmi vā, jīvitaṃ vā me ettha hotu maraṇaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi iṇāyikapīḷā na hotīti adhippāyo.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ^b^majjhe gaṅgāya^eb^ ^a^P0.0146^ea^ ^b^gacchatī^eb^ti so puriso rattindivaṃ gaṅgāya vuyhamāno jīvitapemassa vijjamānattā maraṇaṃ appatto maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā karuṇaṃ ravaṃ ravanto gaṅgāya majjhe mahodakena gacchati.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ atha mahāpuriso aḍḍharattasamaye tassa taṃ karuṇaṃ paridevantassa paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā ``manussasaddo sūyati, mā mayi idha dharante maratu, jīvitamassa dassāmī''ti cintetvā sayanagumbā vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā ``ambho purisa, mā bhāyi, jīvitaṃ te dassāmī''ti vatvā assāsetvā sotaṃ chindanto gantvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā parissamaṃ vinodetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena taṃ āha -- ``ambho purisa ^a^V0.0137^ea^, ahaṃ taṃ bārāṇasigāmimaggaṃ pāpessāmi, tvaṃ `asukaṭṭhāne nāma kañcanamigo vasatī'ti mā kassaci ārocehī''ti. so ``sādhu, sāmī''ti sampaṭicchi. mahāsatto taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā bārāṇasimagge otāretvā nivatti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``tassāhaṃ saddaṃ sutvāna, karuṇaṃ paridevato''tiādi.
[03] tattha ^b^kosi tvaṃ naro^eb^ti tvaṃ ko manusso asi, kuto idha vuyhamāno āgatosīti attho.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ^b^attano^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^ ^b^karaṇa^eb^nti attano kiriyaṃ. ^b^dhanikehi bhīto^eb^ti iṇāyikehi ubbiggo. ^b^tasito^eb^ti utrasto.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa katvāna kāruññaṃ, cajitvā mama jīvita^eb^nti kāruññaṃ katvā mahākaruṇāya samussāhito mama jīvitaṃ tassa purisassa pariccajitvā. ^b^pavisitvā nīhariṃ tassā^eb^ti nadiṃ pavisitvā sotaṃ chindanto ujukameva gantvā mama piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā tato taṃ nīhariṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ``tatthā''tipi pāḷi, tattha nadiyanti attho. ^b^andhakāramhi rattiyā^eb^ti rattiyā andhakārasamaye, kāḷapakkharattiyanti attho.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ^b^assatthakālamaññāyā^eb^ti parissamaṃ apanetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena kilamathassa ^a^P0.0147^ea^ vigatakālaṃ jānitvā. ^b^ekaṃ taṃ varaṃ yācāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ varaṃ yācāmi, mayhaṃ ekaṃ varaṃ dehīti attho. kiṃ taṃ varanti ce? āha -- ^b^mā maṃ kassaci pāvadā^eb^ti ``asukaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇamigo vasatī''ti kassaci rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā maṃ mā pāvada.

[03] atha tasmiṃ purise bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhadivaseyeva so rājā ``ahaṃ, deva, suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ migaṃ mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ supinena addasaṃ, ahañhi saccasupinā, addhā so vijjati, tasmā kañcanamigassa dhammaṃ sotukāmā labhissāmi ce jīvissāmi, no ce me jīvitaṃ natthī''ti aggamahesiyā vutto taṃ assāsetvā ``sace manussaloke atthi, labhissasī''ti vatvā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā ``suvaṇṇamigā nāma hontī''ti pucchitvā ``āma, deva, hontī''ti sutvā sahassatthavikaṃ suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi -- ``yo suvaṇṇamigaṃ ^a^V0.0138^ea^ ācikkhissati, tassa hatthinā saddhiṃ imaṃ dassāmī''ti. tato uttarimpi dātukāmo hutvā --
[21] ``tassa gāmavaraṃ dammi, nāriyo ca alaṅkatā.
[22] yo metaṃ migamakkhāti, migānaṃ migamuttama''nti.. (jā0 1.13.117) --

[25] gāthaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā sakalanagare vācāpesi. atha so seṭṭhiputto taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ``rañño evarūpaṃ migaṃ ^a^M0.0145^ea^ ācikkhissāmi, maṃ rājānaṃ dassethā''ti āha. rājapurisā taṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. rājā ``saccaṃ, bho, addasā''ti pucchi. so ``saccaṃ, deva, mayā saddhiṃ āgacchatu, ahaṃ taṃ dassessāmī''ti āha. rājā tameva purisaṃ maggadesakaṃ katvā mahantena parivārena taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tena mittadubbhinā purisena dassitaṃ padesaṃ ^a^P0.0148^ea^ āvudhahatthe purise samantatova parivāretvā ``ukkuṭṭhiṃ karothā''ti vatvā sayaṃ katipayehi janehi saddhiṃ ekamante aṭṭhāsi. sopi puriso avidūre aṭṭhāsi. mahāsatto saddaṃ sutvā ``mahato balakāyassa saddo, addhā tamhā me purisā bhayena uppannena bhavitabba''nti ñatvā uṭṭhāya sakalaparisaṃ oloketvā ``rañño ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva me sotthi bhavissatī''ti rājābhimukho pāyāsi. rājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā ``nāgabalo avattharanto āgaccheyyā''ti saraṃ sannayhitvā ``imaṃ migaṃ santāsetvā sace palāyati, vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmī''ti bodhisattābhimukho ahosi. mahāsatto --
[21] ``āgamehi mahārāja, mā maṃ vijjhi rathesabha.
[22] ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo''ti.. (jā0 1.13.121) --

[25] gāthaṃ abhāsi. rājā tassa madhurakathāya bajjhitvā saraṃ paṭisaṃharitvā gāravena aṭṭhāsi. mahāsattopi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. mahājanopi sabbāvudhāni apanetvā āgantvā rājānaṃ parivāresi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``nagaraṃ gantvāna ācikkhi, pucchito dhanahetuko.
[22] rājānaṃ so gahetvāna, upagañchi mamantika''nti..

[03] tassattho ^a^V0.0139^ea^ -- yo mittadubbhī pāpapuriso jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tathā mayā pāṇasaṃsayato mocito bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā attanā laddhabbadhananimittaṃ rañño maṃ ^b^ācikkhi,^eb^ ācikkhitvā so rañño gāhāpetuṃ maggadesako hutvā rājānaṃ gahetvā mama santikamupāgamīti.

[03] mahāsatto suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ cālento viya madhurassarena rājānaṃ puna pucchi -- ``ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso ^a^P0.0149^ea^ tiṭṭhate migo''ti. tasmiṃ khaṇe so pāpapuriso thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā sotapathe aṭṭhāsi ^a^M0.0146^ea^. rājā ``iminā me tvaṃ dassito''ti taṃ purisaṃ niddisi. tato bodhisatto --
[21] ``saccaṃ kireva māhaṃsu, narā ekacciyā idha.
[22] kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro''ti.. (jā0 1.13.123) --
[25] gāthamāha. taṃ sutvā rājā saṃvegajāto --
[21] ``kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ.
[22] bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamāna''nti.. (jā0 1.13.124) --
[25] gāthamāha. tato mahāpuriso ``mahārāja, na migaṃ na pakkhiṃ garahāmi, manussaṃ pana garahāmī''ti dassento --
[21] ``yamuddhariṃ vāhane vuyhamānaṃ, mahodake salile sīghasote.
[22] tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo''ti.. (jā0 1.13.125) --

[03] tattha ^b^niplavita^eb^nti uddharitaṃ, ^b^ekacciyo^eb^ti ekacco mittadubbhī pāpapuriso udake patantopi ^a^V0.0140^ea^ uttārito natveva ^b^seyyo. kaṭṭha^eb^ñhi nānappakārena upakārāya saṃvattati, mittadubbhī pana vināsāya, tasmā tato kaṭṭhameva varataranti. ^b^migāna^eb^nti rurumigarāja, migānaṃ kiṃ aññataraṃ ^b^garahasi,^eb^ udāhu ^b^pakkhīnaṃ^eb^ manussānanti pucchati. ^b^bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpa^eb^nti mahantaṃ bhayaṃ maṃ paṭilabhati, attano santakaṃ viya karotīti attho.

[03] ^b^vāhane^eb^ti patitapatite vahituṃ samatthe gaṅgāvahe. ^b^mahodake^eb^ ^a^P0.0150^ea^ ^b^salile^eb^ti mahodakībhūte salile. ubhayenāpi gaṅgāvahassa bahūdakataṃ dasseti. ^b^tato nidāna^eb^nti, mahārāja, yo mayhaṃ tayā dassito puriso, eso mayā gaṅgāya vuyhamāno aḍḍharattasamaye karuṇaṃ paridevanto tato uttārito, tatonidānaṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ ^b^bhayamāgataṃ,^eb^ asappurisehi samāgamo nāma dukkhoti.
[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0147^ea^ sutvā rājā tassa kujjhitvā ``evaṃ bahūpakārassa nāma guṇaṃ na jānāti, dukkhaṃ uppādeti, vijjhitvā naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī''ti saraṃ sannayhi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``yāvatā karaṇaṃ sabbaṃ, rañño ārocitaṃ mayā.
[27] rājā sutvāna vacanaṃ, usuṃ tassa pakappayi.
[22] idheva ghātayissāmi, mittadubbhiṃ anariya''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^yāvatā karaṇa^eb^nti yaṃ tassa mayā kataṃ upakārakaraṇaṃ, taṃ ^b^sabbaṃ. pakappayī^eb^ti sannayhi. ^b^mittadubbhi^eb^nti attano mittesu upakārīsu dubbhanasīlaṃ.

[03] tato mahāsatto ``esa bālo maṃ nissāya mā nassī''ti cintetvā ``mahārāja, vadho nāmesa bālassa vā paṇḍitassa vā na sādhūhi pasaṃsito, aññadatthu garahito eva, tasmā mā imaṃ ghātehi, ayaṃ yathāruci gacchatu, yañceva tassa `dassāmī'ti tayā paṭiññātaṃ, tampi ahāpetvāva dehī''ti āha. ``ahañca te yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ karissāmi, attānaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī''ti āha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``tamahaṃ anurakkhanto, nimminiṃ mama attanā.
[22] tiṭṭhateso mahārāja, kāmakāro bhavāmi te''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^nimmini^eb^nti taṃ mittadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ ^b^anurakkhanto mama^eb^ attano attabhāvena taṃ parivattesiṃ ^a^V0.0141^ea^, attānaṃ rañño niyyātetvā rājahatthato pattaṃ tassa maraṇaṃ nivāresinti attho. ^b^tiṭṭhateso^eb^tiādi vinimayākāradassanaṃ ^a^P0.0151^ea^.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ idāni yadatthaṃ so attavinimayo kato, taṃ dassetuṃ osānagāthamāha. tassattho -- tadā maṃ nissāya taṃ mittadubbhiṃ purisaṃ tasmiṃ raññe jīvitā voropetukāme ahaṃ attānaṃ rañño pariccajanto mama sīlameva anurakkhiṃ, ^b^jīvitaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^nārakkhiṃ^eb^. yaṃ panāhameva attano jīvitanirapekkhaṃ ^b^sīlavā āsiṃ,^eb^ taṃ sammāsambodhiyā eva ^b^kāraṇā^eb^ti.

[03] atha rājā bodhisattena attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tassa purisassa maraṇe nivārente tuṭṭhamānaso ``gaccha, bho, migarājassa anuggahena mama hatthato ^a^M0.0148^ea^ maraṇā mutto''ti vatvā yathāpaṭiññāya tañcassa dhanaṃ dāpesi. mahāsattassa yathāruciyāva anujānitvā taṃ nagaraṃ netvā nagarañca bodhisattañca alaṅkārāpetvā deviyā dhammaṃ desāpesi. mahāsatto deviṃ ādiṃ katvā rañño ca rājaparisāya ca madhurāya manussabhāsāya dhammaṃ desetvā rājānaṃ dasahi rājadhammehi ovaditvā mahājanaṃ anusāsitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā migagaṇaparivuto vāsaṃ kappesi. rājāpi mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā dānādīni puññāni katvā sugatiparāyano ahosi.
[03] tadā seṭṭhiputto devadatto ahosi, rājā ānando, rurumigarājā lokanātho.

[03] tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. tathā idhāpi pavivekārāmatāya janasaṃsaggaṃ anicchato yūthaṃ pahāya ekakavihāro, aḍḍharattasamaye nadiyā vuyhamānassa karuṇaṃ paridevantassa purisassa aṭṭassaraṃ sutvā sayitaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā mahāgaṅgāya mahati udakoghe vattamāne attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā otaritvā sotaṃ pacchinditvā taṃ purisaṃ attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā samassāsetvā phalāphalādīni datvā parissamavinodanaṃ, puna taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā araññato nīharitvā mahāmagge otāraṇaṃ, saraṃ sannayhitvā vijjhissāmīti abhimukhe ṭhitassa rañño nibbhayena hutvā paṭimukhameva gantvā paṭhamataraṃ manussabhāsāya ālapitvā madhurapaṭisanthārakaraṇaṃ, mittadubbhī pāpapurisaṃ ^a^P0.0152^ea^ hantukāmaṃ rājānaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvā punapi attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā maraṇato pamocanaṃ, tassa ca rañño yathāpaṭiññaṃ dhanadāpanaṃ, raññā attano vare dīyamāne tena sabbasattānaṃ abhayadāpanaṃ, rājānañca deviñca pamukhaṃ katvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīsu ^a^V0.0142^ea^ puññesu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ, laddhābhayānaṃ migānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā manussānaṃ sassakhādanato nivāraṇaṃ, paṇṇasaññāya ca tassa yāvajjakālā thāvarakaraṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
[06] rurumigarājacariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M0.0149^ea^ ^b^jaṭilo^eb^ti jaṭāvanto, jaṭābandhakesoti attho. ^b^uggatāpano^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ tāpanato niggaṇhanato tapasaṅkhātaṃ uggatāpanaṃ etassāti uggatāpano, ghoratapo paramadhitindriyoti attho. atha vā nānappakāre diṭṭhadhammikādibhede anatthe uggiraṇato bahi chaḍḍāpanato ghorabhīmabhayānakaṭṭhena vā ``uggā''ti laddhanāme kilese vīriyātapena santāpanato ugge tāpetīti ^b^uggatāpano. mātaṅgo nāma nāmenā^eb^ti nāmena mātaṅgo nāma. mātaṅgakule nibbattiyā jātiyā āgataṃ hissa etaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti sīlasampanno suparisuddhasīlo. ^b^susamāhito^eb^ti upacārappanāsamādhīhi suṭṭhu samāhito, jhānasamāpattilābhīti attho.

[03] tadā hi bodhisatto caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā rūpena duddasiko bahinagare caṇḍālagāme vasati. ``mātaṅgapaṇḍito''ti pakāsanāmo. athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ nagare nakkhatte ghosite yebhuyyena nāgarā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanti. aññatarāpi brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññā soḷasapannarasavassuddesikā devakaññā viya rūpena dassanīyā pāsādikā ``attano ^a^P0.0153^ea^ vibhavānurūpaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī''ti pahūtakhajjabhojjādīni sakaṭesu āropetvā sabbasetaṃ vaḷavārathamāruyha mahatā parivārena uyyānabhūmiṃ gacchati. diṭṭhamaṅgalikā nāmesā, sā kira dussaṇṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ ``avamaṅgala''nti taṃ daṭṭhuṃ na icchati, tenassā ``diṭṭhamaṅgalikā''tveva samaññā udapādi.

[03] tadā bodhisatto kālasseva uṭṭhāya paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā jajjaritamukhabhāgaṃ veṇudaṇḍaṃ gahetvā bhājanahattho nagaraṃ pavisati manusse disvā dūratova tesaṃ dūrīkaraṇatthaṃ tena veṇudaṇḍena saññaṃ karonto. atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā ``ussaratha ussarathā''ti ussāraṇaṃ karontehi attano purisehi nīyamānā nagaradvāramajjhe mātaṅgaṃ disvā ``ko eso''ti āha. ``ayye, mātaṅgacaṇḍālo''ti ^a^V0.0143^ea^ ca vutte ``īdisaṃ disvā gatānaṃ kuto vuḍḍhī''ti yānaṃ nivattāpesi. manussā ``yaṃ mayaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā bahuṃ khajjabhojjādiṃ labheyyāma, tassa no mātaṅgena ^a^M0.0150^ea^ antarāyo kato''ti kupitā ``gaṇhatha, caṇḍāla''nti leḍḍūhi paharitvā visaññībhūtaṃ pātetvā agamaṃsu.

[03] so na cireneva satiṃ paṭilabhitvā vuṭṭhāya manusse pucchi -- ``kiṃ, ayyā, dvāraṃ nāma sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, udāhu brāhmaṇānaṃ eva kata''nti? ``sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇa''nti. ``evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇadvāre ekamantaṃ apakkamantaṃ maṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya manussā imaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpesu''nti rathikāya manussānaṃ ārocetvā ``handāhaṃ imissā mānaṃ bhindissāmī''ti tassā nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā ``ahaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti nipajji. diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya pitā ``gharadvāre mātaṅgo nipanno''ti sutvā ``tassa kākaṇikaṃ detha, telena sarīraṃ makkhetvā gacchatū''ti āha. so ``diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmi''cceva āha. tato brāhmaṇena -- ``dve kākaṇike detha, māsakaṃ pādaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dve tīṇi yāva kahāpaṇasataṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ dethā''ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchati eva. evaṃ tesaṃ mantentānaṃ eva sūriyo atthaṅgato.

[03] atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātā pāsādā oruyha sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā ``tāta, mātaṅga ^a^P0.0154^ea^, diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya aparādhaṃ khama, dve sahassāni gaṇhāhi yāva satasahassaṃ gaṇhāhī''ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchi, nipajji eva. tassevaṃ cha divase nipajjitvā sattame divase sampatte samantā sāmantagharā paṭivisakagharā ca manussā uṭṭhahitvā ``tumhe mātaṅgaṃ vā uṭṭhāpetha, dārikaṃ vā detha, mā amhe nāsayitthā''ti āhaṃsu. tadā kira ayaṃ tasmiṃ dese desadhammo ``yassa gharadvāre evaṃ nipajjitvā caṇḍālo marati, tena gharena saddhiṃ sattasattagharavāsino caṇḍālā hontī''ti.

[03] tato diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātāpitaro diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā caṇḍālānucchavikaṃ parikkhāraṃ datvā paridevamānaṃ eva tassa santikaṃ netvā ``handa, dāni dārikaṃ uṭṭhāya gaṇhāhī''ti adaṃsu. sā passe ṭhatvā ``uṭṭhāhī''ti āha. so ``ahaṃ ativiya kilanto, hatthe gahetvā maṃ uṭṭhāpehī''ti āha. sā tathā akāsi. mātaṅgo ``mayaṃ antonagare vasituṃ na labhāma, ehi, bahinagare caṇḍālagāmaṃ gamissāmā''ti taṃ apassāya attano gehaṃ agamāsi. ``tassā piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā''ti jātakabhāṇakā vadanti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0151^ea^ ^a^V0.0144^ea^ pana gehaṃ gantvā jātisambhedavītikkamaṃ akatvāva katipāhaṃ gehe vasitvā balaṃ gahetvā cintesi -- ``ahaṃ imaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññaṃ mayhaṃ caṇḍālagehe vāsāpesiṃ, handa, dāni taṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ karissāmī''ti. so araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitvā sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā iddhiyā caṇḍālagāmadvāre otaritvā gehadvāre ṭhito diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ pakkosāpetvā ``sāmi, kissa maṃ anāthaṃ katvā pabbajitosī''ti paridevamānaṃ ``tvaṃ, bhadde, mā cintayi, tava porāṇakayasato idāni mahantataraṃ yasaṃ karissāmi, tvaṃ pana `mahābrahmā me sāmiko ^a^P0.0155^ea^, na mātaṅgo, so brahmalokaṃ gato, ito sattame divase puṇṇamāya candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā āgamissatī'ti parisāsu vadeyyāsī''ti vatvā himavantameva gato.

[03] diṭṭhamaṅgalikāpi bārāṇasiyaṃ mahājanamajjhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu tathā kathesi. atha puṇṇamadivase bodhisatto candamaṇḍalassa gaganamajjhe ṭhitakāle brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sakalaṃ kāsiraṭṭhañca ekobhāsaṃ katvā ākāsato otaritvā bārāṇasiyā upari tikkhattuṃ paribbhamitvā mahājanena gandhamālādīhi pūjiyamāno caṇḍālagāmābhimukho ahosi. brahmabhattā sannipatitvā taṃ caṇḍālagāmakaṃ gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehaṃ suddhavatthagandhamālādīhi devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkariṃsu. diṭṭhamaṅgalikā ca tadā utunī hoti. mahāsatto tattha gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aṅguṭṭhena nābhiyaṃ parāmasitvā ``bhadde, gabbho te patiṭṭhito, tvaṃ puttaṃ vijāyissasi, tvampi puttopi te lābhaggayasaggappattā bhavissatha, tava sīsadhovanaudakaṃ sakalajambudīpe rājūnaṃ abhisekodakaṃ bhavissati, nhānodakaṃ pana te amatodakaṃ bhavissati, ye naṃ sīse āsiñcissanti, te sabbarogehi muccissanti, kāḷakaṇṇiyā ca parimuccissanti, tava pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vandantā sahassaṃ dassanti, kathāsavanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā vandantā sataṃ dassanti, cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vandantā ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā vandissanti, appamattā hohī''ti taṃ ovaditvā gehā nikkhamma mahājanassa passantasseva candamaṇḍalaṃ pāvisi.

[03] brahmabhattā ^a^M0.0152^ea^ sannipatitvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ mahantena ^a^P0.0156^ea^ sakkārena nagaraṃ pavesetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena tattha vasāpesuṃ. devavimānasadisañcassā nivesanaṃ kāresuṃ. tattha netvā uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ upanāmesuṃ. puttalābhādi sabbo bodhisattena vuttasadisova ahosi. soḷasasahassā brāhmaṇā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya puttena saha nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti, sahassamattā naṃ parivārenti, anekasahassānaṃ dānaṃ dīyati. atha mahāsatto ``ayaṃ aṭṭhāne abhippasanno, handassa ^a^V0.0145^ea^ dakkhiṇeyye jānāpessāmī''ti bhikkhāya caranto tassā gehaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ sallapitvā agamāsi. atha kumāro gāthamāha --
[21] ``kuto nu āgacchasi dummavāsī, otallako paṃsupisācakova.
[22] saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, ko re tuvaṃ hosi adakkhiṇeyyo''ti.. (jā0 1.15.1).

[03] tena vuttaṃ anācāraṃ asahamānā devatā tassa tesañca soḷasasahassānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ mukhaṃ viparivattesuṃ. taṃ disvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikā mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. bodhisatto ``tassa anācāraṃ asahantehi yakkhehi so vippakāro kato, api ca kho pana imaṃ ucchiṭṭhapiṇḍakaṃ tesaṃ mukhe āsiñcitvā taṃ vippakāraṃ vūpasamehī''ti āha. sāpi tathā katvā taṃ vūpasamesi. atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā puttaṃ āha -- ``tāta, imasmiṃ loke dakkhiṇeyyā nāma mātaṅgapaṇḍitasadisā bhavanti, na ime brāhmaṇā viya jātimattena, mantasajjhāyanamattena vā mānatthaddhā''ti vatvā ye tadā sīlādiguṇavisesayuttā jhānasamāpattilābhino ceva paccekabuddhā ca, tatthevassa pasādaṃ uppādesīti.

[03] tadā vettavatīnagare jātimanto nāma eko brāhmaṇo pabbajitvāpi jātiṃ nissāya mahantaṃ mānamakāsi. mahāsatto ``tassa mānaṃ bhindissāmī''ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāsanne uparisote vāsaṃ kappesi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``ahañca brāhmaṇo eko, gaṅgākūle vasāmubho.
[22] ahaṃ vasāmi upari, heṭṭhā vasati brāhmaṇo''ti..

[03] atha ^a^M0.0153^ea^ ^a^P0.0157^ea^ mahāsatto ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā ``idaṃ jātimantassa jaṭāsu laggatū''ti adhiṭṭhāya nadiyaṃ pātesi. taṃ tassa udakaṃ ācamentassa jaṭāsu laggi, so taṃ disvā ``nassa vasalā''ti vatvā ``kutoyaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī āgato, upadhāressāmi na''nti uddhaṃsotaṃ gacchanto mahāsattaṃ disvā ``kiṃjātikosī''ti pucchi. ``caṇḍālosmī''ti. ``tayā nadiyaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ pātita''nti? ``āma, mayā''ti. ``nassa, vasala, caṇḍāla, kāḷakaṇṇi, mā idha vasi, heṭṭhāsote vasā''ti vatvā heṭṭhāsote vasantenapi pātite dantakaṭṭhe paṭisotaṃ āgantvā ^a^V0.0146^ea^ jaṭāsu laggante ``nassa, vasala, sace idha vasissasi, sattame divase sattadhā te muddhā phalissatī''ti āha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``vicaranto anukūlamhi, uddhaṃ me assamaddasa.
[22] tattha maṃ paribhāsetvā, abhisapi muddhaphālana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^vicaranto anukūlamhī^eb^ti ucchiṭṭhadantakaṭṭhe attano jaṭāsu lagge tassa āgamanagavesanavasena gaṅgāya tīre anuvicaranto. ^b^uddhaṃ me assamaddasā^eb^ti attano vasanaṭṭhānato uparisote mama assamaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ addakkhi. ^b^tattha maṃ paribhāsetvā^eb^ti mama assamaṃ āgantvā jātiṃ sutvā tatova paṭikkamitvā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā ``nassa, vasala caṇḍāla, kāḷakaṇṇi mā idha vasī''tiādīni vatvā bhayena santajjetvā. ^b^abhisapi muddhaphālana^eb^nti ``sace jīvitukāmosi, ettova sīghaṃ palāyassū''ti vatvā ``sace na pakkamissati, ito te sattame divase sattadhā muddhā phalatū''ti me abhisapaṃ adāsi.
[03] kiṃ pana tassa abhisapena muddhā phalatīti? na phalati, kuhako pana so, evamayaṃ maraṇabhayatajjito sudūraṃ pakkamissatīti saññāya santāsanatthaṃ tathā āha.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyya^eb^nti tassa mānatthaddhassa kūṭajaṭilassa ahaṃ yadi kujjheyyaṃ. ^b^yadi sīlaṃ na gopaye^eb^ti sīlaṃ yadi na rakkheyyaṃ, idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma jīvitanirapekkhaṃ sammadeva rakkhitabbanti yadi na cinteyyanti attho. ^b^oloketvānahaṃ tassa, kareyyaṃ chārikaṃ viyā^eb^ti sacāhaṃ tadā tassa appatīto abhavissaṃ ^a^P0.0158^ea^. mama cittācāraṃ ñatvā mayi abhippasannā devatā khaṇeneva taṃ bhasmamuṭṭhiṃ viya viddhaṃseyyunti adhippāyo. satthā pana ^a^M0.0154^ea^ tadā attano appatītabhāve sati devatāhi sādhetabbaṃ tassa anatthaṃ attanā kattabbaṃ viya katvā desesi ``kareyyaṃ chārikaṃ viyā''ti.

[03] vitaṇḍavādī panāha -- ``bodhisattova taṃ jaṭilaṃ icchamāno iddhiyā chārikaṃ kareyya, evañhi sati imissā pāḷiyā attho ujukameva nīto hotī''ti. so evamassa vacanīyo -- ``tvaṃ iddhiyā parūpaghātaṃ vadasi, iddhi nāmesā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena ^a^V0.0147^ea^ iddhīti dasavidhā. tattha ``kataraṃ iddhiṃ vadesī''ti? ``bhāvanāmaya''nti. ``kiṃ pana bhāvanāmayāya parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī''ti? āma, ekacce ācariyā ``ekavāraṃ hotī''ti vadanti, yathā hi paraṃ paharitukāmena udakabharite ghaṭe khitte paropi paharīyati, ghaṭopi bhijjati, evameva bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā ekavāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hoti, tato paṭṭhāya pana sā nassati.

[03] atha so ``bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā neva ekavāraṃ na dvevāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī''ti vatvā pucchitabbo ``kiṃ bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā akusalā abyākatā, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, savitakkasavicārā avitakkavicāramattā avitakkāvicārā, kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā''ti? jānanto ``bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā abyākatā vā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā avitakkāvicārā rūpāvacarā cā''ti vakkhati. so vattabbo ``pāṇātipātacetanā kusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī''ti? jānanto vakkhati ``pāṇātipātacetanā akusalāva dukkhavedanāva savitakkasavicārāva kāmāvacarāvā''ti. evaṃ sante ``tava pañho neva kusalattikena sameti, na vedanāttikena na vitakkattikena na bhūmantarenā''ti pāḷiyā virodhaṃ ^a^P0.0159^ea^ dassetvā saññāpetabbo. yadi pana so ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasānupekkhitā hoti `aho vata yaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā'ti. evampi, bhikkhave, kulumpassa upaghāto hotī''ti ^a^M0.0155^ea^ saṅgītiṃ anāruḷhaṃ kulumpasuttaṃ udāhareyya. tassāpi ``tvaṃ atthaṃ na jānāsi. iddhimā cetovasippattoti hi ettha na bhāvanāmayā iddhi adhippetā, āthabbanikā iddhi adhippetā. sā hi ettha labbhamānā labbhatīti bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā parūpaghāto na sambhavatiyevā''ti saññāpetabbo. no ce saññattiṃ upeti, kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo. tasmā yathāvuttanayenevettha gāthāya attho veditabbo.

[03] tathā pana tena abhisapito mahāsatto ``sacāhaṃ etassa kujjhissāmi, sīlaṃ me arakkhitaṃ bhavissati, upāyenevassa mānaṃ bhindissāmi, sā cassa rakkhā bhavissatī''ti sattame divase sūriyuggamanaṃ vāresi. manussā sūriyassa anuggamanena ubbāḷhā jātimantatāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bhante, tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā''ti pucchiṃsu. so ``na metaṃ kammaṃ, gaṅgātīre pana eko caṇḍālatāpaso vasati, tassetaṃ kammaṃ siyā''ti āha ^a^V0.0148^ea^. manussā mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bhante, tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā''ti pucchiṃsu. ``āmāvuso''ti. ``kiṃkāraṇā''ti? ``tumhākaṃ kulūpakatāpaso maṃ niraparādhaṃ abhisapi, tasmiṃ āgantvā khamāpanatthaṃ mama pādesu patite sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmī''ti. te gantvā taṃ ākaḍḍhantā ānetvā mahāsattassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā khamāpetvā ``sūriyaṃ vissajjetha, bhante''ti āhaṃsu. ``na sakkā vissajjetuṃ, sacāhaṃ vissajjessāmi, imassa sattadhā muddhā phalissatī''ti. ``atha, bhante, kiṃ karomā''ti. mahāsatto ``mattikāpiṇḍaṃ āharathā''ti āharāpetvā ``imaṃ tāpasassa sīse ṭhapetvā tāpasaṃ otāretvā udake ṭhapetha, yadā sūriyo dissati, tadā tāpaso udake nimujjatū''ti vatvā sūriyaṃ vissajjesi. sūriyarasmīhi phuṭṭhamatteva mattikāpiṇḍo sattadhā bhijji. tāpaso udake nimujji. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^P0.0160^ea^ so tadā maṃ abhisapi, kupito duṭṭhamānaso.
[22] tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayi''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ so tadā maṃ abhisapī^eb^ti so jātimantajaṭilo yaṃ muddhaphālanaṃ sandhāya tadā maṃ abhisapi, mayhaṃ sapaṃ adāsi. ^b^tasseva matthake^eb^ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ ^b^nipatī^eb^ti taṃ mayhaṃ upari tena icchitaṃ tasseva pana upari nipati nipatanabhāvena aṭṭhāsi. evañhetaṃ hoti yathā taṃ appaduṭṭhassa padussato. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati...pe0... paṭivātaṃva khitto''ti (dha0 pa0 125; su0 ni0 667; jā0 1.5.94). ^b^yogena taṃ pamocayi^eb^nti taṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ matthakaphālanaṃ upāyena tato pamocesiṃ, taṃ vā jaṭilaṃ tato pamocesiṃ, yena upāyena taṃ na hoti, tathā akāsinti attho.

[03] yañhi tena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāsamāpattivihāraparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadāhi susaṅkhatasantāne mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte ariyūpavādakammaṃ abhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ payuttaṃ, taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpesi, sattame divase vipaccanasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ, khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajji ahosikammabhāvato. ayañhi ariyūpavādapāpassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa ca dhammatā. tattha yaṃ sattame divase bodhisattena sūriyuggamananivāraṇaṃ kataṃ, ayamettha yogoti adhippeto upāyo. tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ. sopi ca mahāsattassa ^a^V0.0149^ea^ guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesīti veditabbaṃ. yaṃ panassa matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ, tassa ca sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ manussānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ, aññathā hi ime pabbajitāpi samānā cittassa vase vattanti, na pana cittaṃ attano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi ^a^P0.0161^ea^ tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ. tadassa nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyāti.
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ idāni yadatthaṃ tadā tasmiṃ tāpase cittaṃ adūsetvā suparisuddhaṃ sīlameva rakkhitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``anurakkhiṃ mama sīla''^eb^nti osānagāthamāha. taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
[03] tadā maṇḍabyo udeno, mātaṅgo lokanātho.

[03] idhāpi sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. tathā nihīnajātikassa sato yathādhippāyaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mānaniggaho, pabbajitvā ``diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya avassayo ^a^M0.0157^ea^ bhavissāmī''ti uppannacitto araññaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā sattadivasabbhantareyeva yathādhippāyaṃ jhānābhiññānibbattanaṃ, tato āgantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya lābhaggayasaggappattiyā upāyasampādanaṃ, maṇḍabyakumārassa mānaniggaho, jātimantatāpasassa mānaniggaho, tassa ca ajānantasseva bhāvino jīvitantarāyassa apanayanaṃ, mahāparādhassāpi tassa akujjhitvā attano sīlānurakkhaṇaṃ, acchariyabbhutapāṭihāriyakaraṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbā.
[06] mātaṅgacariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^mahāpakkho^eb^ti mahāparivāro. ^b^mahiddhiko^eb^ti mahatiyā deviddhiyā samannāgato. ^b^dhammo nāma mahāyakkho^eb^ti nāmena dhammo nāma mahānubhāvo devaputto. ^b^sabbalokānukampako^eb^ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā mahākaruṇāya sabbalokaṃ anuggaṇhanako.

[03] mahāsatto hi tadā kāmāvacaradevaloke dhammo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti. so dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito ^a^V0.0150^ea^ dibbarathamabhiruyha accharāgaṇaparivuto manussesu sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā attano attano gharadvāresu sukhakathāya ^a^P0.0162^ea^ nisinnesu puṇṇamuposathadivase gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ākāse ṭhatvā ``pāṇātipātādīhi dasahi akusalakammapathehi viramitvā tividhasucaritadhammaṃ pūretha, matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino bhavatha, saggaparāyanā hutvā mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavissathā''ti manusse dasakusalakammapathe samādapento jambudīpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``dasakusalakammapathe, samādapento mahājanaṃ.
[22] carāmi gāmanigamaṃ, samitto saparijjano''ti..
[03] tattha ^b^samitto^eb^ti dhammikehi dhammavādīhi sahāyehi sasahāyo.

[03] tena ^a^M0.0158^ea^ ca samayena adhammo nāmeko devaputto kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. ``so pāṇaṃ hanatha, adinnaṃ ādiyathā''tiādinā nayena satte akusalakammapathe samādapento mahatiyā parisāya parivuto jambudīpaṃ vāmaṃ karoti. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``pāpo kadariyo yakkho, dīpento dasa pāpake.
[22] sopettha mahiyā carati, samitto saparijjano''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^pāpo^eb^ti pāpadhammehi samannāgato. ^b^kadariyo^eb^ti thaddhamaccharī. ^b^yakkho^eb^ti devaputto. ^b^dīpento dasa pāpake^eb^ti sabbaloke gocaraṃ nāma sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogāya jātaṃ. tasmā satte vadhitvā yaṃkiñci katvā ca attā pīṇetabbo, indriyāni santappetabbānītiādinā nayena pāṇātipātādike dasa lāmakadhamme kattabbe katvā pakāsento. ^b^sopetthā^eb^ti sopi adhammo devaputto imasmiṃ jambudīpe. ^b^mahiyā^eb^ti bhūmiyā āsanne, manussānaṃ dassanasavanūpacāreti attho.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ tattha ye sattā sādhukammikā dhammagaruno, te dhammaṃ devaputtaṃ tathā āgacchantameva disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhamālādīhi pūjentā yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamanā tāva abhitthavanti ^a^P0.0163^ea^, pañjalikā namassamānā tiṭṭhanti, tassa vacanaṃ sutvā appamattā sakkaccaṃ puññāni karonti. ye pana sattā pāpasamācārā kurūrakammantā, te adhammassa vacanaṃ sutvā abbhanumodanti ^a^V0.0151^ea^, bhiyyosomattāya pāpāni samācaranti. evaṃ te tadā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā ceva ujuvipaccanīkakiriyā ca hutvā loke vicaranti. tenāha bhagavā ^b^``dhammavādī adhammo ca, ubho paccanikā maya''^eb^nti.

[03] evaṃ pana gacchante kāle athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ rathā ākāse sammukhā ahesuṃ. atha nesaṃ parisā ``tumhe kassa, tumhe kassā''ti pucchitvā ``mayaṃ dhammassa, mayaṃ adhammassā''ti vatvā maggā okkamitvā dvidhā jātā. dhammassa pana adhammassa ca rathā abhimukhā hutvā īsāya īsaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu. ``tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehi, tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī''ti aññamaññaṃ maggadāpanatthaṃ vivādaṃ akaṃsu. parisā ^a^M0.0159^ea^ ca nesaṃ āvudhāni abhiharitvā yuddhasajjā ahesuṃ. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ --
[22] ``dhure dhuraṃ ghaṭṭayantā, samimhā paṭipathe ubho''..
[21] ``kalaho vattatī bhesmā, kalyāṇapāpakassa ca.
[22] maggā okkamanatthāya, mahāyuddho upaṭṭhito''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^dhure dhura^eb^nti ekassa rathīsāya itarassa rathīsaṃ ^b^ghaṭṭayantā. samimhā^eb^ti samāgatā sammukhībhūtā. puna ^b^ubho^eb^ti vacanaṃ ubhopi mayaṃ aññamaññassa paccanīkā hutvā loke vicarantā ekadivasaṃ paṭimukhaṃ āgacchantā dvīsu parisāsu ubhosu passesu maggato okkantāsu saha rathena mayaṃ ubho eva samāgatāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^bhesmā^eb^ti bhayajanako. ^b^kalyāṇapāpakassa cā^eb^ti kalyāṇassa ca pāpakassa ca. ^b^mahāyuddho upaṭṭhito^eb^ti mahāsaṅgāmo ^a^P0.0164^ea^ paccupaṭṭhito āsi.

[03] aññamaññassa hi parisāya ca yujjhitukāmatā jātā. tattha hi dhammo adhammaṃ āha -- ``samma, tvaṃ adhammo, ahaṃ dhammo, maggo mayhaṃ anucchaviko, tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī''ti. itaro ``ahaṃ daḷhayāno balavā asantāsī, tasmā maggaṃ na demi, yuddhaṃ pana karissāmi, yo yuddhe jinissati, tassa maggo hotū''ti āha. tenevāha --
[21] ``yasokaro ^a^V0.0152^ea^ puññakarohamasmi, sadātthuto samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
[22] maggāraho devamanussapūjito, dhammo ahaṃ dehi adhamma maggaṃ..
[21] ``adhammayānaṃ daḷhamāruhitvā, asantasanto balavāhamasmi.
[22] sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjaṃ, maggaṃ ahaṃ dhamma adinnapubbaṃ..
[21] ``dhammo ^a^M0.0160^ea^ have pāturahosi pubbe, pacchā adhammo udapādi loke.
[22] jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca sanantano ca, uyyāhi jeṭṭhassa kaniṭṭha maggā..
[21] ``na yācanāya napi pātirūpā, na arahatā tehaṃ dadeyya maggaṃ.
[22] yuddhañca no hotu ubhinnamajja, yuddhamhi yo jessati tassa maggo..
[21] ``sabbā disā anuvisaṭohamasmi, mahabbalo amitayaso atulyo.
[22] guṇehi sabbehi upetarūpo, dhammo adhamma tvaṃ kathaṃ vijessasi..
[21] ``lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ, na jātarūpena hananti lohaṃ.
[22] sace adhammo hañchati dhammamajja, ayo suvaṇṇaṃ viya dassaneyyaṃ..
[21] ``sace ^a^P0.0165^ea^ tuvaṃ yuddhabalo adhamma, na tuyhaṃ vuḍḍhā ca garū ca atthi.
[22] maggañca te dammi piyāppiyena, vācā duruttānipi te khamāmī''ti.. (jā0 1.11.26-32).
[03] imā hi tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanakathā.

[03] tattha ^b^yasokaro^eb^ti dhamme niyojanavasena devamanussānaṃ yasadāyako. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^sadātthuto^eb^ti sadā thuto niccappasattho. ^b^sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajja^eb^nti somhi ahaṃ adhammo adhammayānarathaṃ abhiruḷho abhīto balavā, kiṃkāraṇā ajja, bho dhamma, kassaci adinnapubbaṃ maggaṃ tuyhaṃ dammi. ^b^pāturahosī^eb^ti paṭhamakappikakāle imasmiṃ loke dasakusalakammapathadhammo pubbe pāturahosi, pacchā adhammo. ^b^jeṭṭho cā^eb^ti pure nibbattabhāvena ahaṃ jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca porāṇako ca, tvaṃ pana kaniṭṭho, tasmā ``maggā uyyāhī''ti vadati.

[03] ^b^napi^eb^ ^a^M0.0161^ea^ ^a^V0.0153^ea^ ^b^pātirūpā^eb^ti ahañhi bhoto neva yācanāya na paṭirūpavacanena na maggārahatāya maggaṃ dadeyyaṃ. ^b^anuvisaṭo^eb^ti ahaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisāti sabbā disā attano guṇena patthaṭo paññāto. ^b^lohenā^eb^ti ayomuṭṭhikena. ^b^hañchatī^eb^ti hanissati. ^b^yuddhabalo adhammā^eb^ti sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo asi adhamma. ^b^vuḍḍhā ca garū cā^eb^ti yadi tuyhaṃ ime vuḍḍhā ime garū paṇḍitāti etaṃ natthi. ^b^piyāppiyenā^eb^ti piyena viya appiyena, appiyenapi dadanto (jā0 aṭṭha0 4.11.32) piyena viya te maggaṃ dadāmīti attho.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ mahāsatto hi tadā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ imaṃ pāpapuggalaṃ sabbalokassa ahitāya paṭipannaṃ evaṃ mayā vilomaggāhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ accharaṃ paharitvā `anācāra mā idha tiṭṭha, sīghaṃ paṭikkama vinassā'ti vadeyyaṃ, so taṅkhaṇaññeva mama dhammatejena bhusamuṭṭhi viya vikireyya, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, svāhaṃ sabbalokaṃ ^a^P0.0166^ea^ anukampanto `lokatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī'ti paṭipajjāmi, ayaṃ kho pana pāpo āyatiṃ mahādukkhabhāgī, svāyaṃ mayā visesato anukampitabbo, tasmāssa maggaṃ dassāmi, evaṃ me sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ akhaṇḍitaṃ bhavissatī''ti. evaṃ pana cintetvā bodhisatte ``sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo''ti gāthaṃ vatvā thokaṃ maggato okkantamatte eva adhammo rathe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto avaṃsiro pathaviyaṃ patitvā pathaviyā vivare dinne gantvā avīcimhi eva nibbatti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyya''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyya^eb^nti tassa adhammassa yadi ahaṃ kujjheyyaṃ. ^b^yadi bhinde tapoguṇa^eb^nti tenevassa kujjhanena mayhaṃ tapoguṇaṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ yadi vināseyyaṃ. ^b^sahaparijanaṃ tassā^eb^ti saparijanaṃ taṃ adhammaṃ. ^b^rajabhūta^eb^nti rajamiva bhūtaṃ, rajabhāvaṃ pattaṃ ^b^ahaṃ kareyyaṃ^eb^.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ^b^apicāha^eb^nti ettha ^b^aha^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^sīlarakkhāyā^eb^ti sīlarakkhaṇatthaṃ. ^b^nibbāpetvānā^eb^ti paṭikacceva khantimettānuddayassa upaṭṭhāpitattā tasmiṃ adhamme uppajjanakakodhassa anuppādaneneva dosapariḷāhavūpasamanena mānasaṃ vūpasametvā. ^b^saha janenokkamitvā^eb^ti mayhaṃ parijanena saddhiṃ maggā okkamitvā tassa pāpassa adhammassa ahaṃ maggaṃ adāsiṃ.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ^b^saha^eb^ ^a^M0.0162^ea^ ^b^pathato okkante^eb^ti vuttanayena cittassa vūpasamaṃ katvā ``maggaṃ te dammī''ti ca vatvā thokaṃ maggato saha okkamanena. ^b^pāpayakkhassā^eb^ti adhammadevaputtassa. ^b^tāvade^eb^ti taṅkhaṇaṃ ^a^V0.0154^ea^ eva mahāpathavī vivaramadāsi. ^b^jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ``maggañca te dammī''ti gāthāya kathitakkhaṇeyevāti vuttaṃ.

[03] evaṃ tasmiṃ bhūmiyaṃ patite catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā sakalaṃ varāvaraṃ dhārentīpi mahāpathavī ``nāhamimaṃ pāpapurisaṃ dhāremī''ti kathentī viya tena ṭhitaṭṭhāne dvidhā bhijji. mahāsatto pana tasmiṃ nipatitvā avīcimhi nibbatte rathadhure yathāṭhitova saparijano mahatā devānubhāvena gamanamaggeneva gantvā attano bhavanaṃ pāvisi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``khantībalo ^a^P0.0167^ea^ yuddhabalaṃ vijetvā, hantvā adhammaṃ nihanitva bhūmyā.
[22] pāyāsi vitto abhiruyha sandanaṃ, maggeneva atibalo saccanikkamo''ti.. (jā0 1.11.34).
[03] tadā adhammo devadatto ahosi, tassa parisā devadattaparisā, dhammo lokanātho, tassa parisā buddhaparisā.

[03] idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā. tathā idhāpi dibbehi āyuvaṇṇayasasukhāadhipateyyehi dibbeheva uḷārehi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa anekasahassasaṅkhāhi accharāhi sabbakālaṃ paricāriyamānassa mahati pamādaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa sato īsakampi pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā ``lokatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī''ti māse māse puṇṇamiyaṃ dhammaṃ dīpento saparijano manussapathe vicaritvā mahākaruṇāya sabbasatte adhammato vivecetvā dhamme niyojanaṃ, adhammena samāgatopi tena kataṃ anācāraṃ agaṇetvā tattha cittaṃ akopetvā khantimettānuddayameva paccupaṭṭhapetvā akhaṇḍaṃ suvisuddhañca katvā attano sīlassa rakkhaṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
[06] dhammadevaputtacariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M0.0163^ea^ ^b^pañcālaraṭṭhe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake janapade. ^b^nagaravare, kapilāya^eb^nti ``kapilā''ti evaṃladdhanāme ^a^V0.0155^ea^ uttamanagare. ``nagaravare''ti vatvā puna ^b^``puruttame''^eb^ti vacanaṃ tasmiṃ kāle jambudīpe sabbanagarānaṃ tassa nagarassa agganagarabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^jayaddiso nāmā^eb^ti raññā attano paccatthike jite jāto, attano vā paccāmittabhūtaṃ yakkhinīsaṅkhātaṃ jayaddisaṃ jitoti evaṃladdhanāmo. ^b^sīlaguṇamupāgato^eb^ti ācārasīlañceva ussāhasampattiyādirājaguṇañca ^a^P0.0168^ea^ upāgato, tena samannāgatoti attho.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa rañño^eb^ti jayaddisarājassa, ahaṃ putto ahosinti vacanaseso. ^b^sutadhammo^eb^ti yāvatā rājaputtena sotabbadhammo nāma, tassa sabbassa sutattā sutadhammo, bahussutoti attho. atha vā ^b^sutadhammo^eb^ti vissutadhammo, dhammacariyāya samacariyāya pakāso paññāto, loke patthaṭakittidhammoti attho. ^b^alīnasatto^eb^ti evaṃnāmo. ^b^guṇavā^eb^ti uḷārehi mahāpurisaguṇehi samannāgato. ^b^anurakkhaparijano sadā^eb^ti saddhādiguṇavisesayogato catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi sammadeva saṅgahaṇato ca sabbakālaṃ sambhattaparivārajano.
[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ^b^pitā me migavaṃ gantvā, porisādaṃ upāgamī^eb^ti mayhaṃ pitā jayaddisarājā migavaṃ caranto araññamajjhaṃ gantvā porisādaṃ manussakhādakaṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ upagañchi, tena samāgami.

[03] jayaddisarājā kira ekadivasaṃ ``migavaṃ gamissāmī''ti tadanurūpena mahatā parivārena kapilanagarato nikkhami. taṃ nikkhantamattameva takkasilāvāsī nando nāma brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā gāthā nāma kathetuṃ ādāya upasaṅkamitvā attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi. rājā ``nivattitvā suṇissāmī''ti tassa vasanagehaṃ paribbayañca dāpetvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho ``yassa passena migo palāyati, tasseva so gīvā''ti vatvā mige pariyesanto vicarati. atheko pasadamigo mahājanassa padasaddena āsayato nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho gantvā ^a^M0.0164^ea^ palāyi. amaccā parihāsaṃ kariṃsu. rājā taṃ anubandhitvā tiyojanamatthake taṃ parikkhīṇajavaṃ ṭhitaṃ vijjhitvā pātesi. patitaṃ khaggena dvidhā katvā anatthikopi ``maṃsena migaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhī''ti vacanamocanatthaṃ kāje katvā āgacchanto ekassa nigrodhassa mūle dabbatiṇesu nisīditvā thokaṃ vissamitvā ^a^P0.0169^ea^ gantuṃ ārabhi.

[03] tena ca samayena tasseva rañño jeṭṭhabhātā jātadivase eva ekāya yakkhiniyā khādituṃ gahito ārakkhamanussehi anubaddhāya tāya niddhamanamaggena gacchantiyā ure ṭhapito mātusaññāya ^a^V0.0156^ea^ mukhena thanaggahaṇena puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno tadāhāropayogitāya manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto anukkamena vuddhippatto attānaṃ antaradhāpanatthaṃ yakkhiniyā dinnaosadhamūlānubhāvena antarahito hutvā manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā jīvanto tāya yakkhiniyā matāya taṃ osadhamūlaṃ attano pamādena nāsetvā dissamānarūpova manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto naggo ubbiggavirūpadassano rājapurisehi passitvā anubaddho palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tassa nigrodhassa mūle vāsaṃ kappento rājānaṃ disvā ``bhakkhosi me''ti hatthe aggahesi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``so me pitumaggahesi, bhakkhosi mama mā calī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^so me pitumaggahesī^eb^ti so porisādo mama pitaraṃ jayaddisarājānaṃ attano nisinnarukkhasamīpamāgataṃ ^b^``mama bhakkho^eb^ tvaṃ āgatosi, hatthaparipphandanādivasena ^b^mā cali,^eb^ calantampi ahaṃ taṃ khādissāmī''ti hatthe aggahesi.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassa yakkhiniputtassa. ^b^tasitavedhito^eb^ti cittutrāsena tasito sarīraparikampena vedhito. ^b^ūrukkhambho^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ thaddhabhāvo, yena so tato palāyituṃ nāsakkhi.

[03] ^b^migavaṃ gahetvā muñcassū^eb^ti ettha ^b^migava^eb^nti migavavasena laddhattā taṃ migamaṃsaṃ ``migava''nti āha, imaṃ migamaṃsaṃ gahetvā maṃ muñcassūti attho. so hi rājā naṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ disvā bhīto ūrukkhambhaṃ patvā khāṇuko viya aṭṭhāsi. so vegena gantvā taṃ hatthe gahetvā ``bhakkhosi me āgatosī''ti āha. atha naṃ rājā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ``sace āhāratthiko, imaṃ te maṃsaṃ dadāmi, taṃ gahetvā khāda, maṃ muñcāhī''ti āha ^a^M0.0165^ea^. taṃ sutvā porisādo ``kimidaṃ mayhameva santakaṃ ^a^P0.0170^ea^ datvā mayā vohāraṃ karosi, nanu imaṃ maṃsañca tvañca mama hatthagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhameva santakaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭhamaṃ khāditvā pacchā maṃsaṃ khādissāmī''ti āha.

[03] atha rājā ``maṃsanikkayenāyaṃ na maṃ muñcati, mayā ca migavaṃ āgacchantena tassa brāhmaṇassa `āgantvā te dhanaṃ dassāmī'ti paṭiññā katā. sacāyaṃ yakkho anujānissati, saccaṃ anurakkhanto gehaṃ gantvā taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā puna imassa yakkhassa bhattatthaṃ āgaccheyya''nti cintetvā tassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi. taṃ sutvā porisādo ``sace tvaṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto gantukāmosi, gantvā tassa brāhmaṇassa dātabbaṃ dhanaṃ datvā saccaṃ anurakkhanto sīghaṃ ^a^V0.0157^ea^ puna āgaccheyyāsī''ti vatvā rājānaṃ vissajjesi. so tena vissaṭṭho ``tvaṃ mā cintayi, ahaṃ pātova āgamissāmī''ti vatvā magganimittāni sallakkhento attano balakāyaṃ upagantvā tena parivuto nagaraṃ pavisitvā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā tā gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni datvā yānaṃ āropetvā ``imaṃ takkasilameva nethā''ti manusse datvā brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā dutiyadivase porisādassa santikaṃ gantukāmo puttaṃ rajje patiṭṭhapetuṃ anusāsaniñca dento tamatthaṃ ārocesi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``migavaṃ gahetvā muñcassu, katvā āgamanaṃ puna.
[22] brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā, pitā āmantayī mamaṃ..
[21] ``rajjaṃ putta paṭipajja, mā pamajji puraṃ idaṃ.
[22] kataṃ me porisādena, mama āgamanaṃ punā''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^āgamanaṃ punā^eb^ti puna āgamanaṃ paṭiññātassa porisādassa saṅgaraṃ katvā. ^b^brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā^eb^ti takkasilato āgatassa nandanāmassa brāhmaṇassa tā gāthā sutvā catusahassaparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ datvā. ^b^pitā āmantayī mama^eb^nti mama pitā jayaddisarājā maṃ āmantesi.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^M0.0166^ea^ āmantesīti ce? āha ^b^``rajja''^eb^ntiādi. tassattho -- ^b^putta,^eb^ tvaṃ imaṃ kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ ^b^paṭipajja,^eb^ yathāhaṃ dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāremi, evaṃ tvampi chattaṃ ussāpetvā ^b^rajjaṃ^eb^ kārehi. tvaṃ idaṃ puraṃ rakkhanto rajjañca kārento mā pamādamāpajji, asukasmiṃ ^a^P0.0171^ea^ ṭhāne nigrodharukkhamūle porisādena yakkhena katametaṃ mayā saṅgaraṃ mama puna tassa santikaṃ āgamanaṃ uddissa, kevalaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa dhanadānatthaṃ idhāgato saccaṃ anurakkhanto, tasmā tatthāhaṃ gamissāmīti.

[01] taṃ sutvā mahāsatto ``mā kho tvaṃ, mahārāja, tattha agamāsi, ahaṃ tattha gamissāmi. sace pana tvaṃ, tāta, gamissasiyeva, ahampi tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmiyevā''ti. ``evaṃ sante mayaṃ ubhopi na bhavissāma, tasmā ahameva tattha gamissāmī''ti nānappakārena vārentaṃ rājānaṃ saññāpetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā pitu atthāya attānaṃ pariccajitvā sotthibhāvāya pitari sāsitavādaṃ payuñjamāne mātubhaginibhariyāsu ca saccakiriyaṃ karontīsu āvudhaṃ gahetvā nagarato ^a^V0.0158^ea^ nikkhamitvā assupuṇṇamukhaṃ mahājanaṃ anubandhantaṃ āpucchitvā pitarā akkhātanayena yakkhavāsamaggaṃ paṭipajji. yakkhiniputtopi ``khattiyā nāma bahumāyā, ko jānāti kiṃ bhavissatī''ti rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā rañño āgamanaṃ olokento nisinno kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā ``pitaraṃ nivattetvā putto āgato bhavissati, natthi me bhaya''nti otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāva nisīdi. mahāsatto āgantvā tassa purato aṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``mātāpitū ca vanditvā, nimminitvāna attanā.
[22] nikkhipitvā dhanuṃ khaggaṃ, porisādaṃ upāgami''nti..

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasatthahatthūpagata^eb^nti sasatthahatthaṃ upagataṃ āvudhapāṇiṃ maṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ disvā. ^b^kadāci so tasissatī^eb^ti so yakkho api taseyya. ^b^tena bhijjissati sīla^eb^nti tena tassa tāsuppādanena mayhaṃ sīlaṃ vinassati saṃkilissati. ^b^paritāsaṃ kate mayī^eb^ti mayi tassa paritāsaṃ kate sati.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīlakhaṇḍabhayā mayhaṃ, tassa dessaṃ na byāhari^eb^nti yathā ca sīlabhedabhayena nihitasattho tassa santikaṃ agamāsi, evaṃ mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayā ^a^M0.0167^ea^ eva tassa porisādassa dessaṃ aniṭṭhampi na byāhariṃ, kevalaṃ pana mettacittena hitavādī idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ vacanaṃ abhāsiṃ.

[03] mahāsatto ^a^P0.0172^ea^ ca gantvā purato ṭhito. yakkhiniputto taṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo ``kosi tvaṃ, kuto āgato, kiṃ maṃ na jānāsi `luddo manussamaṃsakhādako'ti, kasmā ca idhāgatosī''ti pucchi. kumāro ``ahaṃ jayaddisarañño putto, tvaṃ porisādakoti jānāmi, pitu jīvitaṃ rakkhituṃ idhāgato, tasmā taṃ muñca, maṃ khādā''ti āha. puna yakkhiniputto mukhākāreneva ``taṃ tassa puttoti ahaṃ jānāmi, dukkaraṃ pana tayā kataṃ evaṃ āgacchantenā''ti āha. kumāro ``na idaṃ dukkaraṃ, yaṃ pitu atthe jīvitapariccajanaṃ, mātāpituhetu hi evarūpaṃ puññaṃ katvā ekanteneva sagge pamodati, ahañca `amaraṇadhammo nāma koci satto natthī'ti jānāmi, attanā ca kiñci kataṃ pāpaṃ nāma na sarāmi, tasmā maraṇatopi me bhayaṃ natthi, idaṃ sarīraṃ mayā te nissaṭṭhaṃ, aggiṃ jāletvā khādā''ti āha. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``ujjālehi mahāaggiṃ, papatissāmi rukkhato.
[22] tvaṃ pakkakālamaññāya, bhakkhaya maṃ pitāmahā''ti..

[01] taṃ ^a^V0.0159^ea^ sutvā yakkhiniputto ``na sakkā imassa maṃsaṃ khādituṃ, upāyena imaṃ palāpessāmī''ti cintetvā ``tena hi araññaṃ pavisitvā sāradārūni āharitvā niddhūme aṅgāre karohi, tattha te maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāmī''ti āha. mahāsatto tathā katvā tassa ārocesi. so taṃ olokento ``ayaṃ purisasīho maraṇatopi bhayaṃ natthi, evaṃ nibbhayo nāma na mayā diṭṭhapubbo''ti lomahaṃsajāto kumāraṃ olokesi. kumāro kissa maṃ olokesi, na yathāvuttaṃ karosīti. yakkhiniputto mahāsattaṃ ``sattadhā tassa muddhā phaleyya, yo taṃ khādeyyā''ti āha. ``sace maṃ na khāditukāmosi, atha kasmā aggiṃ kāresī''ti? ``tava pariggaṇhanattha''nti. ``tvaṃ idāni maṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhissasi, svāhaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sakkassa devarañño attānaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ na adāsi''nti imamatthaṃ dassento --
[21] ``idañhi ^a^M0.0168^ea^ ^a^P0.0173^ea^ so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre.
[22] teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthuto kāmaduhajja yakkhā''ti..(jā0 1.16.93) --
[25] gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^saso avāsesi sake sarīre^eb^ti attano sarīrahetu imaṃ sarīraṃ khāditvā idha vasāti evaṃ sake sarīre attano sarīraṃ dento taṃ brāhmaṇarūpaṃ sakkaṃ tattha vāsesi. ^b^sasatthuto^eb^ti ``sasī''ti evaṃ sasasaddena thuto. ^b^kāmaduho^eb^ti kāmavaḍḍhano. ^b^yakkhā^eb^ti deva.
[03] evaṃ mahāsatto cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā attano sakkenapi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ abhāsi. taṃ sutvā porisādo acchariyabbhutacittajāto --
[21] ``cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā.
[21] evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kapile mahānubhāva.
[22] āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho''ti.. (jā0 1.16.94) --

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā ``gaccha mahāvīrā''ti kumāraṃ vissajjesi. sopi taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañca sīlāni ^a^V0.0160^ea^ datvā ``yakkho nu kho esa, no''ti vīmaṃsanto ``yakkhānaṃ akkhīni rattāni honti animisāni ca, chāyā ca na paññāyati, asambhīto hoti, na imassa tathā. tasmā nāyaṃ yakkho manusso eso, mayhaṃ kira pitu tayo bhātaro yakkhiniyā gahitā, tesu tāya dve khāditā bhavissanti, eko puttasinehena paṭijaggito bhavissati. iminā tena bhavitabba''nti nayaggāhena anumānena sabbaññutaññāṇena viya aviparītato niṭṭhaṃ gantvā ``mayhaṃ pitu ācikkhitvā rajje patiṭṭhāpessāmī''ti cintetvā ``na tvaṃ yakkho, pitu me jeṭṭhabhātikosi, ehi mayā saddhiṃ gantvā kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī''ti āha. tena ^a^M0.0169^ea^ vuttaṃ ``tvaṃ pitāmahā''ti, tvaṃ mama mahāpitāti ^a^P0.0174^ea^ attho. itarena ``nāhaṃ manusso''ti vutte tena saddhātabbassa dibbacakkhukatāpasassa santikaṃ nesi. tāpasena ``kiṃ karontā pitā puttā araññe vicarathā''ti pitubhāve kathite porisādo saddahitvā ``gaccha, tāta, tvaṃ, na me rajjena attho, pabbajissāmaha''nti tāpasassa santike isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``iti sīlavataṃ hetu, nārakkhiṃ mama jīvitaṃ.
[22] pabbājesiṃ cahaṃ tassa, sadā pāṇātipātika''nti..
[03] tattha ^b^sīlavataṃ hetū^eb^ti sīlavantānaṃ mama pitūnaṃ hetu. atha vā ^b^sīlavataṃ hetū^eb^ti sīlavatahetu, mayhaṃ sīlavatasamādānanimittaṃ tassa abhijjanatthaṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti taṃ porisādaṃ.

[01] atha mahāsatto attano mahāpitaraṃ pabbajitaṃ vanditvā nagarassa samīpaṃ gantvā ``kumāro kira āgato''ti sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā nāgarehi negamajānapadehi ca paccuggato rājānaṃ vanditvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. taṃ sutvā rājā taṅkhaṇaññeva bheriṃ carāpetvā mahantena parivārena tassa santikaṃ gantvā ``ehi, bhātika, rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī''ti āha. ``alaṃ, mahārājā''ti. ``tena hi mayhaṃ uyyāne vasā''ti. ``na āgacchāmī''ti. rājā tassa assamassa avidūre gāmaṃ nivesetvā bhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi. so cūḷakammāsadammanigamo nāma jāto.
[03] tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, tāpaso sāriputto, porisādo aṅgulimālo, kaniṭṭhā uppalavaṇṇā, aggamahesī rāhulamātā, alīnasattukumāro lokanātho.

[03] tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. tathā pitarā nivāriyamāno attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pitu jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ ``porisādassa santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti ^a^V0.0161^ea^ nicchayo, tassa ca santāsapariharaṇatthaṃ nihitasatthassa gamanaṃ, ``attano sīlakhaṇḍanaṃ mā hotū''ti tena piyavācāya samudācāro, tena ca nānānayehi pariggaṇhiyamānassa maraṇasantāsābhāvo, pitu atthe mayhaṃ sarīraṃ saphalaṃ karissāmīti haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvo, sakkenāpi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyassa sasajātiyampi pariccāgatthaṃ ^a^P0.0175^ea^ attano jīvitanirapekkhabhāvassa jānanaṃ, tena ^a^M0.0170^ea^ samāgamepi ossaṭṭhepi cittassa vikārābhāvo, tassa ca manussabhāvamahāpitubhāvānaṃ aviparītato jānanaṃ, ñātamatte ca taṃ kulasantake rajje patiṭṭhāpetukāmatā, dhammadesanāya saṃvejetvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpananti. evamādayo idha bodhisattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
[06] alīnasattucariyāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^saṅkhapālo^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- devabhogasampattisadisāya mahatiyā nāgiddhiyā samannāgatattā ^b^mahiddhiko^eb^. heṭṭhā dve, upari dveti catasso dāṭhā āvudhā etassāti ^b^dāṭhāvudho^eb^. uggatejavisatāya ^b^ghoraviso^eb^. nāgayonisiddhāhi dvīhi jivhāhi samannāgatoti ^b^dvijivho^eb^. mahānubhāvānampi urena gamanato ``uragā''ti laddhanāmānaṃ nāgānaṃ adhipatibhāvato ^b^uragādhibhū^eb^.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā sandhibhāvena gataṭṭhānasaṅkhāte ^b^catuppathe^eb^. aparāparaṃ mahājanasañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte ^b^mahāmagge^eb^. tato eva mahājanasamākiṇṇabhāvena ^b^nānājanasamākule^eb^. idāni vakkhamānānaṃ catunnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena ^b^caturo aṅge. adhiṭṭhāya^eb^ adhiṭṭhahitvā, citte ṭhapetvā. yadāhaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma yathāvuttarūpo nāgarājā homi, tadā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ṭhāne ^b^vāsaṃ^eb^ uposathavāsavasena nivāsaṃ ^b^akappayiṃ^eb^ kappesiṃ.

[03] mahāsatto hi dānasīlādipuññapasuto hutvā bodhipariyesanavasena aparāparaṃ devamanussagatīsu saṃsaranto kadāci devabhogasadisasampattike nāgabhavane nibbattitvā saṅkhapālo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. so gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī hutvā manussayoniṃ patthento uposathavāsaṃ vasi. athassa nāgabhavane ^a^P0.0176^ea^ vasantassa uposathavāso ^a^V0.0162^ea^ na sampajjati, sīlaṃ saṃkilissati, tena so nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā kaṇhavaṇṇāya nadiyā avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare ekaṃ vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā ^a^M0.0171^ea^ uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya cātuddasapannarasesu samādinnasīlo ``mama cammādīni atthikā gaṇhantū''ti attānaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā nipajjati, pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``punāparaṃ yadā homi, saṅkhapālo''^eb^tiādi. tassattho vutto eva.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ yaṃ panettha ^b^chaviyā cammenā^eb^tiādikaṃ ``caturo aṅge adhiṭṭhāyā''ti vuttaṃ caturaṅgādhiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. chavicammāni hi idha ekamaṅgaṃ. evaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasantassa mahāsattassa dīgho addhā vītivatto.

[03] athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ tathā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne soḷasa bhojaputtā ``maṃsaṃ āharissāmā''ti āvudhahatthā araññe carantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhamantā taṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā ``mayaṃ ajja godhāpotakampi na labhimhā, imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā khādissāmā''ti cintetvā ``mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyyāti yathānipannakaṃyeva naṃ bhogesu sūlehi vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā''ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu. bodhisattassāpi sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ viya jiñjukaphalasadisehi akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ ativiya sobhati. so tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā rattakkhīni ummīletvā te sūlahatthe ^a^P0.0177^ea^ āgacchante disvā ``ajja mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī''ti attānaṃ dānamukhe niyyātetvā ``ime mama sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte na olokessāmī''ti attano sīlakhaṇḍabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sīsaṃ bhogantare eva pavesetvā nipajji.

[03] atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā sakaṇṭakā kāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kājehi ādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhānepi akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi. tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya nīyamānassa sīsaṃ olambitvā bhūmiṃ paharati ^a^M0.0172^ea^. atha naṃ ``sīsamassa olambatī''ti mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggetvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``addasaṃsu ^a^V0.0163^ea^ bhojaputtā, kharā luddā akāruṇā.
[22] upagañchuṃ mamaṃ tattha, daṇḍamuggarapāṇino..
[21] ``nāsāya vinivijjhitvā, naṅguṭṭhe piṭṭhikaṇṭake.
[22] kāje āropayitvāna, bhojaputtā hariṃsu ma''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^bhojaputtā^eb^ti luddaputtā. ^b^kharā^eb^ti kakkhaḷā, pharusakāyavacīkammantā. ^b^luddā^eb^ti dāruṇā, ghoramānasā. ^b^akāruṇā^eb^ti nikkaruṇā. ^b^daṇḍamuggarapāṇino^eb^ti caturassadaṇḍahatthā. ^b^nāsāya vinivijjhitvā^eb^ti rajjukaṃ pavesetuṃ sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā. ^b^naṅguṭṭhe piṭṭhikaṇṭake^eb^ti naṅguṭṭhappadese tattha tattha piṭṭhikaṇṭakasamīpe ca vinivijjhitvāti sambandho. ^b^kāje āropayitvānā^eb^ti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vinivijjhitvā baddhesu aṭṭhasu vettalatāmaṇḍalesu ^a^P0.0178^ea^ ekekasmiṃ ovijjhitaṃ ekekaṃ kājaṃ dve dve bhojaputtā attano attano khandhaṃ āropetvā.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasāgarantaṃ pathavi^eb^nti samuddapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ. ^b^sakānanaṃ sapabbata^eb^nti saddhiṃ kānanehi pabbatehi cāti sakānanaṃ sapabbatañca. ^b^nāsāvātena jhāpaye^eb^ti sacāhaṃ ^b^icchamāno^eb^ icchanto kujjhitvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjeyyaṃ, samuddapariyantaṃ sakānanaṃ sapabbataṃ imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ jhāpeyyaṃ, saha nāsāvātavissajjanena chārikaṃ kareyyaṃ, etādiso tadā mayhaṃ ānubhāvo.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ evaṃ santepi ^b^sūlehi vinivijjhante, koṭṭayantepi sattibhi. bhojaputte na kuppāmī^eb^ti dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ vettalatāpavesanatthañca sāradārūhi tacchetvā katehi tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhantepi dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tikhiṇāhi sattīhi tahiṃ tahiṃ koṭṭayantepi bhojaputtānaṃ luddānaṃ na kuppāmi. ^b^esā me sīlapāramī^eb^ti evaṃ mahānubhāvassa tathā adhiṭṭhahantassa yā me mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayena tesaṃ ^a^M0.0173^ea^ akujjhanā, esā ekanteneva jīvitanirapekkhabhāvena pavattā mayhaṃ sīlapāramī, sīlavasena paramatthapāramīti attho.

[03] tathā pana bodhisatte tehi nīyamāne mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañcasakaṭasatāni ādāya sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte mahāsattaṃ harante disvā kāruññaṃ uppādetvā te ludde pucchi -- ``kissāyaṃ nāgo nīyati, netvā cimaṃ kiṃ karissathā''ti? te ``imassa nāgassa maṃsaṃ sāduñca muduñca thūlañca pacitvā khādissāmā''ti āhaṃsu. atha so tesaṃ soḷasavāhagoṇe pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni ^a^V0.0164^ea^ bhariyānampi tesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni datvā ``sammā, ayaṃ mahānubhāvo nāgarājā, attano sīlaguṇena tumhākaṃ na dubbhi, imaṃ kilamantehi bahuṃ tumhehi apuññaṃ pasutaṃ, vissajjethā''ti āha. te ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ manāpo bhakkho, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā, tathāpi tava vacanaṃ amhehi pūjetabbaṃ, tasmā ^a^P0.0179^ea^ imaṃ nāgaṃ vissajjessāmā''ti vissajjetvā mahāsattaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya tā kaṇṭakācitā āvutā kāḷavettalatā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ ārabhiṃsu.

[03] atha so nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇavedhato paṭiharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ nīhari. tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā yaṃ bandhanaṃ tassa natthuto pavesetvā paṭimukkaṃ, taṃ bandhanaṃ saṇikaṃ mocayiṃsu. mahāsatto muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi āḷāraṃ olokesi. luddā thokaṃ gantvā ``urago dubbalo, matakāle gahetvāva naṃ gamissāmā''ti nilīyiṃsu. āḷāro mahāsattassa añjaliṃ paggayha ``gaccheva kho tvaṃ, mahānāga, mā taṃ luddā puna gahesu''nti vadanto thokaṃ taṃ nāgaṃ anugantvā nivatti.

[03] bodhisatto nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena parivārena nikkhamitvā āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ tattha netvā tīhi kaññāsatehi saddhiṃ mahantamassa yasaṃ datvā dibbehi kāmehi santappesi. āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ vasitvā dibbe ^a^M0.0174^ea^ kāme paribhuñjitvā ``icchāmahaṃ, samma, pabbajitu''nti nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā tato nikkhamitvā himavantappadesaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā bārāṇasiraññā samāgato tena ācārasampattiṃ nissāya pasannena ``tvaṃ uḷārabhogā maññe kulā pabbajito, kena nu kho kāraṇena pabbajitosī''ti puṭṭho attano pabbajjākāraṇaṃ kathento luddānaṃ hatthato bodhisattassa vissajjāpanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ rañño ācikkhitvā --
[21] ``diṭṭhā mayā mānusakāpi kāmā, asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā.
[22] ādīnavaṃ ^a^P0.0180^ea^ kāmaguṇesu disvā, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi, rāja..
[21] ``dumapphalānīva ^a^V0.0165^ea^ patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā.
[22] etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo''ti.. (jā0 2.17.191-192) --
[25] imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi.
[03] taṃ sutvā rājā --
[21] ``addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino.
[22] nāgañca sutvāna tavañcaḷāra, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī''ti.. (jā0 2.17.193) --
[03] athassa tāpaso --
[21] ``addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino.
[22] nāgañca sutvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī''ti.. (jā0 2.17.194) --
